story:
Give Back & Have Fun Building Your Dream Home!

(Kita Marie Williams,
Owner of KMW Interiors)

My name is Kita Marie Williams and I'm the Owner of KMW Interiors, an Interior Design and Home staging company based in Los Angeles, CA. For 15+ years I have been helping friends and family make their homes beautiful.  However, 2 years ago, I was given the opportunity of a lifetime that allowed me to be able to create KMW Interiors and extend my services to the general public. Now that my company is growing, I want to expand my horizons and make my mark in the digital world while giving back to a cause that is close to my heart.

I've been involved with Habitat for Humanity of about 5 years now and I feel that I can do much more for the organization. With this new app "My Virtual Dream Home" (App name subject to change), users would be able to build the home of their dreams and feel great knowing that they are contributing to a cause that provides decent housing for families in need all over the globe!

How the App Works

Available on iPhone, Android, Google Play and more, this would be a perfect simulation app to decorate your virtual home with the best furniture and other household items available today! Users would be able to Increase their home value with new household items,  customize floors and walls by choosing from predefined decorative items and expand their home with more rooms through in-app purchases or through points. 

(Realistic 3D Interior environment: Contemporary Bedroom) 

Design your Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen, Bathrooms, Study room and much more. Simulate your dream home in stunning 3D view. You can rotate each item in 6 views. But don't stop at designing the inside of your space!  Users will also design their garden with trees, flowers and even create a garden with vegetables. You can be both an interior & exterior decorator!

Explore eco-friendly options for your home as well and see if you can score tons of points with virtual LEED certification!

My Partners & Our Goal

I will be working with a BrandCrux, a great App development company with a solid track record of creating successful and amazing apps. To learn more about BrandCrux, visit www.brandcrux.com.


There are nearly 2 billion people around the world who live in slum housing and more than 100 million are homeless. Habitat helps by building or renovating simple, decent houses in partnership with those in need.

Families left homeless by natural disasters, war and civil unrest often face dire housing situations as they struggle to rebuild their lives. Habitat for Humanity provides shelter and housing assistance to help these families recover.

Our Goal:

With $10,000 we will be able to:

  • Create a stunning promotional website
  • Create a promotional teaser video
  • Design initial conceptual mock-ups and UI designs
  • Distribute an exciting press release to build buzz around the game development
  • Conduct in-depth analysis that will help with marketing and targeting
With these tools, we will be able to recruit investors and partners to help fund the development of this advanced and beautiful gaming app.
YOU WILL GET TO SEE THE DEVELOPMENT OF THIS APP FROM CONCEPT TO LAUNCH!

Risks & Challenges

The greatest risk is not raising enough money for the initial promotional development. This initial push is essential to getting this app in front of target investor and partners. Once we pass this hurdle, the rest will flow much easier.

So PLEASE, donate today and help us turn this dream into reality!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you love the concept, but can't donate. SPREAD THE WORD! Share this page with friends and family and get people talking about this great new app and how this fantastic and fun game can actually give back to families in need all over the world!

story:
Magx in a flash

Magx is a new way of mobile gaming.  With the support of our backers we'll be able to bring an awesome mobile gaming device that isn't restricted by licensing requirements or locked down where you can only do with it what the company tells you.  Android is open, Magx is open, and gaming should be open for everyone who wants to develop.

We haven't seen any other devices that match what we would be looking for in an Android gaming system.  There are some coming on the market, but they're not that mobile.  You should be able to fit a mobile handheld in your pocket and play it in the car and on an airplane.

Magx also is done with development.  We're ready to go into production!

Why Magx?

There are a ton of amazing developers out there, and when it comes down to it, they're not able to build the amazing games they're capable of because they aren't an already established player in the main mobile gaming market.  We intend to change that by giving them the hardware to match their needs.  No more having to dumb-down games because there aren't any physical buttons or controls that are needed for precise actions and more enjoyable gameplay.  No more crazy development costs associated with trying to get a new game out on a more mainstream mobile console.  If you got a great idea to make a game, then make it!

Magx isn't going to be a new way to play touchscreen games, it's about a new generation of games coming from anywhere and everywhere.  You don't have to package, sign agreements and contracts and hire manufacturers to create amazing mobile games anymore.  Just build it and let the world know.

What is Magx?

Magx is the combination of hardware and a little bit of software that bring mobile gaming straight from developers to players.  2 Analog sticks? Check! D-Pad? Check! 6 buttons that can be used in combination? You betcha!  The Magx console isn't something magical (although you would think so with that name), but what is special about it, is that it's the first time a mobile console of this caliber is being pushed through for both players and developers.  Magx is and will be rooted...always!

Besides the console, what else is Magx going to do?

Anything any other Android tablet can do : )

It's built on open source code, so anything you want to do, feel free.  Want to load a different ROM, we won't stop you.  As always, any additions we make to the system will definitely be available to the community.

Specs?

What you're really here for!

  • Tegra 3
  • 1GB RAM
  • 5" HD display (1280x768)
  • 2MP Front Camera
  • 16GB Internal Storage
  • Android 4.0
  • Wifi b/g/n
  • Microphone
  • Accelerometer
  • Gyroscope
  • HDMI Mini
  • HDMI Cable, USB Cable, Wall charger included

Where are we at with launching?

Here is our prototype board completed.  There's a battery on the back (3000mAh!).  This is a functioning board with MicroUSB Charge and HDMI Miniplug, and Headphone port.  Charging is done through USB.

Here it is running Android. The case that you see is a 3D printing. It has a flat front and back bezel to keep the size down to a minimum.

Here it is connected to a TV through the included HDMI cable

We're ready to go into production almost immediately.  We simply need to place the order for the parts, start producing cases and assembling.  Our delivery time is well within what we have budgetted to get a hold of all the pieces we need to bring this together.

What about 3G/4G connection?

Although we would love to add a cellular connection to Magx, we just don't see this being in the cards at this moment.  This could change though.

Let us know which color you want

story:
Update 11/21/13: 7 Days To Go!!!!


Thank you everyone for your donations! with 7 days to go we are excited to see all the support we've had so far! We have a small present for you to be upload shortly and in addition we convinced Lee Keramory to share his own personal Lost Ground with the community if we hit 5k! We also convinced him of something special as well to have the community create together if the full 6k is matched! Something about the community creating their own Lost Ground together! Thank you all again for your support!



Welcome to our vision to move one of the most unique MMOs into its beta stage!

The World we are trying to create will be a free MMO in which the players can decide their fate -- a world of swords, magic, and hints of advanced technology.

One of the more unique aspects of The World is the Chaos Gate (mentioned below), a device that allows one to travel to distant, and often forgotten, lands that humans were unable to reach by normal means. Players can use the Chaos Gates to travel through dangerous fields and dungeons seeking rare and long lost treasures.

Players can also relax in towns, converse with other players, and prepare for their next adventure through local shops or even in their guild bases. If a player decides not to fight, they can enjoy other activities, such as raising Neko pets and fishing. Only the most powerful of adventurers will be able to unlock the secrets of The World, and, perhaps, be the key to its salvation.

Platforms: Windows - Mac - Linux - Mobile

There is almost nothing that you will not be able to do within The World!

The Chaos Gate system is a keyword-based warping system inspired by the ".hack" series, and is unique in an MMO. By providing different keywords, one will be warped to a unique field whose features are shaped by the town you have come from and the words used. What this means is that there will be countless landscapes and each one of them will be unique. Not only this, but the dungeons will be unique as well, as they are also based off of the keywords. Of course monsters, bosses, and treasures that are located within these maps will be vast, so every trip through the Chaos Gate will be an adventure.


Chaos Gate

For those who may be worried about being able to meet other players on these many variations of fields, let us ease your minds. First off, if one player provides the same keywords as another player, they will be together on the field with that other person. 

The Keywords do NOT create new (instanced) fields when they are used. They only teleport players to fields that are already made. In addition, we've found, through years of experience with this system, players, like with any other MMO, have preferred spots for camping and leveling. There will be, in any MMO, hot spots where you will find most players going through and leveling. For our system, that means there will be fields that are more popular then others. This is something the players can take advantage of. Over time, players who either prefer to play alone or with many other people will learn which fields to go to.

Classes are broken down into two categories: Basic Classes and Advanced Classes**. A Basic Class is what everyone will start out with. After some time spent leveling up, there will be a time where you will be able to choose your Advanced Class. Each Basic Class can choose from two Advanced Classes, each with their own unique advantages and skills. Normally, one of the Advanced Class choices will allow you to use a different weapon than their Basic Class. For example, a Lancer will be able to choose a Reaper, which will use a Scythe!

Basic Classes include:

  • The Knight, the hero determined to protect all people from the dangers of The World.
  • The Thief, the stealthy class that specializes in acquiring treasures.
  • The Wavemaster, a mage with magic symbols that make use of powerful spells to take down their foes.
  • The Blademaster, a balanced class in all respects, cleaves through their enemies with giant swords.
  • The Lancer, a nimble spear and staff master who uses far-reaching attacks at blinding speeds.
  • And lastly... The Runecaster! A gunner who uses a special gun to shoot cartridges imbued with powerful magic at their opponents.

Lancer Concept

**There is more information on classes as well as their advanced options to be found at our website and forum.


Another important aspect of our game, especially for one of our staff members, is the story**! No world can be made to be interesting without a rich, deep history that sets itself apart from other worlds. Although there are many things that make a game, we believe that a complex and meaningful story is what sets our game apart from many others. 

The most interesting part of an MMO of any kind is that the show must always go on. Unlike many games, where, if the story ends, the game ends; we plan to continue creating amazing stories that the players will go through as they venture through our world.

There will be two different story lines within The World. One that is easy, but mandatory to continue on your adventure, and another that will be an optional story line that is both challenging and rewarding. A small example of one of the stories is about a time when you meet a fellow adventurer, who soon becomes your mentor, aiding you throughout your quests:

You discover the legend of a powerful treasure that has been untouched by man. As you travel through the dungeon rumored to contain the treasure, you are attacked by two powerful-looking cloaked men. Try as you may, you fail to fend them off and your mentor is killed. You decide to take responsibility for what happened and embark on a quest for revenge, but we guarantee you it becomes far more than that!


Of course, there will be plenty of other quests! We have designed a large number of quests, each with their own path, each telling a tale of their own. Some quests are simply fun, designed to challenge a player or a group, but many other quests expand to include gaining knowledge of The World which cannot be found in the main story of the game. These include further understanding of the landscape, ruins, the many towns, and even monster tribes!

An example of these would include fighting what are known as the Elemental Deities. Only through optional side quests can you unlock these amazing battles and the rewards that follow.

Finally, one of the most unique features in this MMORPG is a system in which everything is affected by everything else. Players will become able to have a massive influence on the environment around them. Not only this, but, when left alone, the monsters themselves will help shape the surrounding area, leading to several surprises that await unsuspecting players. Remember, this is a world, and we plan to treat it as such.

**The back story can be found on our Website. To sum it up, The World is allowed rotate by the actions and creations of the Twin Goddesses, Aura and Luna, for through them several deities were created.

The World is a huge place that has remained unexplored for thousands of years. Only recently has the human race gathered enough strength and knowledge to expand their reach beyond their towns, cities, and strongholds. 

Together, the human race has slowly begun to expand, and is discovering the ruins of races that have long since disappeared. Many of these ruins and dungeons contain dangers that most people cannot even imagine. For those brave enough to be willing to take the risk, however, the reward will surely be great.

Using the Chaos Gate, players can explore large landscapes which are characterized and shaped by the different elements. Some areas included are: 
  • Frozen Tundras
  • Relaxing Beaches
  • Trecherous Mountains
  • Beautiful Forests
  • Arid Deserts
  • Chaotic Volcanoes
Hidden on these massive fields are the ruins of ancient races and castles that have long since been abandoned. Within these dark corridors and stairways are powerful creatures that now call these structures their new homes. If an adventurer is lucky, they may also find, beyond the dangers, a rune statue guarding long forgotten treasures such as sacred armors and rare weapons.

Monster Concept

These dungeons are not the only dangers players should be wary of. Some monster tribes have prospered above the ground, building makeshift fortresses and bases to further their reaches. Finally, there are rumors of strange lands and structures that defy all reason and lack any logical explanation.

Atop the many features of the game we've covered so far -- the environment surrounding the players -- we understand the value and importance of player to player interactions. Guilds will be in the game; they are player made and will have a vast number of functions to aid groups venturing through The World. 

Groups will be able to take advantage of many options to help organize and spread their guild throughout the lands. Guilds can even compete for special fortresses and bases located on various fields, and ward off those who try and invade them.

Another aspect of player to player interaction is Player versus Player combat, or PvP. There will be PvP interaction within The World, but not everywhere. We understand the important line that exists between players who play for PvP and those who may not prefer it, and we have always worked to please both sides. We have come to the conclusion that the more dangerous areas (PvP areas) will contain some higher level treasures. We see a nice balance from adding an extra danger in finding the most desired of weapons and armor. 

PvP will not be limited to free range slaughter. Tournaments, both official and player made, will be available to the users. Eventually, other PvP additions will be created; like Sieges, for example.

Player versus Environment interactions, or (PvE) will also be expanded beyond quests and story lines. We, the developers, love armies. We want the player to be able to experience all out war with various monster types, protecting or wiping out various monster races from strongholds for rewards. 

Elements

In both PvP and PvE, we, as a team, have decided to add what we believe to be a unique feature: the power of the elements. Although many MMOs put very little stress on things such as "fire beats wood", and "wood beats water," we plan to encourage our players to use their elemental advantage against their enemies! Monsters, weapons, and bosses stress the importance of the element they are powered by. 

There will also be a concept built around Elemental Crystals. All weapons, starting out, have a neutral base with basic weapon skills. However you can make your weapon stronger by forging an Elemental Crystal to give the weapon elemental skills and bonus damage. Although, once forged onto a weapon, they cannot be removed; these powerful new weapons will give much needed help to players on their quests.

Elemental Weapons Concept

Our development team have known each other for many years, mostly through the same website we grew up with as gamers and developers. Although we developed different professional paths, we all agree that our true desire is to design games, and we will not stop until we are able to do just that.

The Staff:

Lee, The World Producer.
Lee has been a dedicated artist and storyteller throughout most of his life and through the development process. Although Lee is not as tech savvy as the rest of the team, he has pulled through with great 3D models and amazing concepts for the game. He has a Bachelor’s Degree in Psychology and is currently working at a mental health center. His dream is to create a great video game, then move on to the horror genre of gaming, hoping to pull at peoples heart strings as they play. This of course, will pour into The World, so prepare for a scare!

Gato, Lead Programmer
Gato has worked along with Lee for many years on small projects for fun. Gato has not stopped pouring countless hours and hard effort into this project, continuing to out-do himself with every small update he makes. He has pushed the game as far as it has gotten today, and helped maintain the dedicated community we have.

Axl, Lead Texture/Interface Designer
Axl has continued to be a strong member of various .hack communities and eventually stumbled on this project a while back. Using his artistic talents he has helped reshape how the game looks and feels. To top it off he has also created the current forums and website, which are both fantastic.

Brian, Gameplay Developer
Having a Bachelor’s Degree in Mathematics, Brian has helped shape the battle mechanics and balancing in not only the classes themselves but all around combat and interactions. He is also constantly aiding in the physics of the game as well. Like all of us, he hopes to turn his skills into a long time profession of video game development.

Allen, Cinematographer/Web Developer
Allen has spent many years editing and creating videos. He then took his interest and talent professionally by developing his skills with the tools and foundation necessary. He contributed his editing skills into a community based project that he enjoyed being a part of. Combined with his editorial skills with other staffs directional and animation talents, together they've created wonderful cut-scenes rivaling what many would expect from professional gaming.

Your money will be used to push this game from a very early alpha into its beta stage. Your pledge will be used to shape this world by giving us the ability to have magnificent:

  • Music: so that not a single field or town will be dull, Animations that breathe life into the characters that inhabit The World
  • Beautiful 3D Models that can bring you joy in the simplest of moments.
  • Game changing Plugins that allow us to extend the features this game has to offer while speeding up development further.
  • Stunning Textures that compliment and expand the beauty of every model.
  • Quests and Stories that consist of grandiose epics that will inspire you not only to read them, but also to be involved emotionally.
  • A Server back-end that can hold up against thousands of users interacting in a dynamic world.
  • Effects that call forth constant amusement and awe.
  • And Gameplay that is not only well thought out, but also fun.

Some examples of assets, textures, and music this will provide:

  1. New, professionally made character models, customizations and outfits.
  2. Full featured and easy to use GUI.
  3. Realistic skies full of clouds that hover over Mu Hel and the other root towns. 
  4. Fields with unique and powerful weather patterns.
  5. A robust AI system for enemies and NPC’s alike that provide the player with a rewarding and challenging experience.
  6. Full featured and detailed sound effects for PC's, NPC's, skills, and the environment.
  7. Light voice acting work for players, and NPC's.
  8. Powerful graphics optimizations that allow for the highest quality possible at minimal expense to those with lower-end PC's.
  9. Character deformations, transformations, mouth movements, and a nice array of facial alterations.
  10. Deformable terrain that will be altered by what you, NPC's, and other players do within the world. This will allow us to carve natural cliffs, caverns, pits, and caves.
  11. Beautiful and expressive magic/skill effects for all classes.
  12. Lush flora, fauna, and scenery to cover the environment in lovely detail.
  13. Tools to make it easy to host large, unique, and fun live events.
  14. Fast paced and exciting combat that lets players feel the thrill of battle during each encounter.
  15. Cut the development time down to a fraction of what’s currently required.
  16. 100+ fields to explore and unlock.
  17. 4 unique and extensive root towns.

Open Source MMO

Working on creating an MMO has been a long and difficult journey. At the time of its inception, when The World was only a dream - we had no idea that this game would require so much from us, and, while we have enjoyed the journey so far, we would like to make the path easier to travel for teams in the future -- since very few solutions exist for gamers and indie developers looking to achieve their dreams of creating an mmo aside from dedicating their entire lives to a project. 

We hope to help fill this void by offering our game's code as an Open Source Project to the developer community; along with examples and documentation, we hope that gamers and developers alike can spend less time worrying about code and spend more time creating their dream worlds.

There is a lot of extra features we would love to add into our game to make it ready for production faster. That being said, however, even with our funding request at $6,000, there is still a limit of what we can do!

Every time the funding from you, the contributors, increases the amount funded past a certain threshold, we can add extra content into the game. Although we have a lot more content planned than what is listed, these are some of the things we guarantee will make it into our game if we get enough funding!

$7,000 - An extra pre-game service before logging into The World that will be built into the patcher. Named Ultimate, players can send messages to others, check the news, and use a message board exclusively for online users without leaving the patcher itself.

$9,000 - Emotiv functioning with The World.  Emotiv will give players the option of controlling their character, and interacting with the environment entirely with their mind. We believe adding this technology will allow players to experience interaction in a whole new way. [Emotiv integration will be done when the new SDK releases in 2014 if stretch goal is met.]

$12,000 - Oculus Rift functioning with The World. Reaching this goal will allow us to put resources towards integrating The World with the amazing Oculus rift, which will provide player's with a 3D environment that they can view naturally. Along with emotiv, this will allow us to create an immersive experience like none ever seen in an mmo.


                                             Thank you all for your support!
Legal Questions
For those people who have brought up questions of legality. This project is not .hack, it is a completely unique game inspired by the .hack universe. All story elements, artwork, and names will be legally distinct at the time of release. The legal steps the team is taking to ensure the project's success include but are not limited to the above. For more information or additional legal questions please contact one of the staff members directly.
story_txt:
Update 11/21/13: 7 Days To Go!!!!

Thank you everyone for your donations! with 7 days to go we are excited to see all the support we've had so far! We have a small present for you to be upload shortly and in addition we convinced Lee Keramory to share his own personal Lost Ground with the community if we hit 5k! We also convinced him of something special as well to have the community create together if the full 6k is matched! Something about the community creating their own Lost Ground together! Thank you all again for your support!

Welcome to our vision to move one of the most unique MMOs into its beta stage!
The World we are trying to create will be a free MMO in which the players can decide their fate -- a world of swords, magic, and hints of advanced technology.
One of the more unique aspects of The World is the Chaos Gate (mentioned below), a device that allows one to travel to distant, and often forgotten, lands that humans were unable to reach by normal means. Players can use the Chaos Gates to travel through dangerous fields and dungeons seeking rare and long lost treasures.
Players can also relax in towns, converse with other players, and prepare for their next adventure through local shops or even in their guild bases. If a player decides not to fight, they can enjoy other activities, such as raising Neko pets and fishing. Only the most powerful of adventurers will be able to unlock the secrets of The World, and, perhaps, be the key to its salvation.Platforms: Windows - Mac - Linux - MobileThere is almost nothing that you will not be able to do within The World!

The Chaos Gate system is a keyword-based warping system inspired by the ".hack" series, and is unique in an MMO. By providing different keywords, one will be warped to a unique field whose features are shaped by the town you have come from and the words used. What this means is that there will be countless landscapes and each one of them will be unique. Not only this, but the dungeons will be unique as well, as they are also based off of the keywords. Of course monsters, bosses, and treasures that are located within these maps will be vast, so every trip through the Chaos Gate will be an adventure.Chaos Gate
For those who may be worried about being able to meet other players on these many variations of fields, let us ease your minds. First off, if one player provides the same keywords as another player, they will be together on the field with that other person. The Keywords do NOT create new (instanced) fields when they are used. They only teleport players to fields that are already made. In addition, we've found, through years of experience with this system, players, like with any other MMO, have preferred spots for camping and leveling. There will be, in any MMO, hot spots where you will find most players going through and leveling. For our system, that means there will be fields that are more popular then others. This is something the players can take advantage of. Over time, players who either prefer to play alone or with many other people will learn which fields to go to.


Classes are broken down into two categories: Basic Classes and Advanced Classes**. A Basic Class is what everyone will start out with. After some time spent leveling up, there will be a time where you will be able to choose your Advanced Class. Each Basic Class can choose from two Advanced Classes, each with their own unique advantages and skills. Normally, one of the Advanced Class choices will allow you to use a different weapon than their Basic Class. For example, a Lancer will be able to choose a Reaper, which will use a Scythe!Basic Classes include:

The Knight, the hero determined to protect all people from the dangers of The World.
The Thief, the stealthy class that specializes in acquiring treasures.
The Wavemaster, a mage with magic symbols that make use of powerful spells to take down their foes.
The Blademaster, a balanced class in all respects, cleaves through their enemies with giant swords.
The Lancer, a nimble spear and staff master who uses far-reaching attacks at blinding speeds.
And lastly... The Runecaster! A gunner who uses a special gun to shoot cartridges imbued with powerful magic at their opponents.



Lancer Concept**There is more information on classes as well as their advanced options to be found at our website and forum.

Another important aspect of our game, especially for one of our staff members, is the story**! No world can be made to be interesting without a rich, deep history that sets itself apart from other worlds. Although there are many things that make a game, we believe that a complex and meaningful story is what sets our game apart from many others. The most interesting part of an MMO of any kind is that the show must always go on. story:
BagChecker

Have you ever been in the airport and heard over the intercom, "any unattended bags will be destroyed" and did you ever wonder what fun that would be to destroy a nice piece of luggage? Well, now is your chance to destroy a few virtual bags of your own!

The design for the game app was all the input from my 12 year old son Lukas. With his free flowing creative mind he kept on telling me, "Dad, wouldn't it be cool if there was a fire hole to drop the bags for destruction, oh! yeah!, we need a dog sniffer, some sirens and bad things too to X-ray..." On and on it went like this until he sketched it out.

My son's dream is to be a game developer. He lives and breaths apps of all kinds. This is his first go at the big time. Please help him make this happen so that he will be encouraged to develop more game ideas and continue to learn how to code (he is not at the stage yet where he can develop a game so advanced as this).

Your contribution is vital for this project to succeed. He has raised some of his own funds to contribute for the final quoted price from the developers, but with your help he will not have to walk the neighbors dog for the next 5 years to make this game a reality. 

Kind regards,

Kurt and his son Lukas

What We Need & What You Get

  • We have a quoted price to make this game for 5000 USD, We need to raise 4000 USD.
  • Some of the perks you will see below. Such as adding an object of your choice, or a logo (if you own it) and a name to a box or bag to appear in the game or even a pixel statue of yourself. Think how much fun it would be to see your artwork, favorite toy or object appear over and over again in the game and with your permission it can even go into the burn hole for destruction.
  • If we don't reach our funding goal we will still go ahead with making the game, but the road might be longer, and Lukas might have to walk more dogs, do more dishes and sell more lemonade. Every contribution helps. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share the link by using the share tool to spread the word about this fun game. Tell your friends, and lets burn some luggage!
story_txt:
BagCheckerHave you ever been in the airport and heard over the intercom, "any unattended bags will be destroyed" and did you ever wonder what fun that would be to destroy a nice piece of luggage? Well, now is your chance to destroy a few virtual bags of your own!The design for the game app was all the input from my 12 year old son Lukas. With his free flowing creative mind he kept on telling me, "Dad, wouldn't it be cool if there was a fire hole to drop the bags for destruction, oh! yeah!, we need a dog sniffer, some sirens and bad things too to X-ray..." On and on it went like this until he sketched it out.My son's dream is to be a game developer. He lives and breaths apps of all kinds. This is his first go at the big time. Please help him make this happen so that he will be encouraged to develop more game ideas and continue to learn how to code (he is not at the stage yet where he can develop a game so advanced as this).Your contribution is vital for this project to succeed. He has raised some of his own funds to contribute for the final quoted price from the developers, but with your help he will not have to walk the neighbors dog for the next 5 years to make this game a reality. Kind regards,Kurt and his son LukasWhat We Need & What You Get
We have a quoted price to make this game for 5000 USD, We need to raise 4000 USD.
Some of the perks you will see below. Such as adding an object of your choice, or a logo (if you own it) and a name to a box or bag to appear in the game or even a pixel statue of yourself. Think how much fun it would be to see your artwork, favorite toy or object appear over and over again in the game and with your permission it can even go into the burn hole for destruction.
If we don't reach our funding goal we will still go ahead with making the game, but the road might be longer, and Lukas might have to walk more dogs, do more dishes and sell more lemonade. Every contribution helps. 
Other Ways You Can HelpPlease share the link by using the share tool to spread the word about this fun game. Tell your friends, and lets burn some luggage!

story:
Hello my name is Eli Brewer! You might recognize me from my recent Kickstarter campaign Forbidden Sanctity! This was also a Wii U title but it was revealed a little too early and required a lot of funds to complete the project! As of now the project is deemed too far behind to reach it's funding goal! So for now, I will be developing this smaller Wii U exclusive and have it delivered to you all on the Nintendo eShop within a few months! It is a much smaller project with a very reasonable funding goal! At the same time that I am working on this project, my team and I will continue to work on Forbidden Sanctity and relaunch in soon! 

  • This game is a exploration and narrative based horror game for the Nintendo Wii U. Michael Kennedy is a young boy who receives a letter from his father who recently took an "off the books" construction job in a strange valley down the road from their Mountain Home. In the letter the father explains that he is probably already dead by the time his son receives the letter. Michael has no idea what is going on with this new construction team or this hidden valley, but he loves his father and will do anything to try to save him.
  • This campaign is extremely important to me and my team as it will allow us to grow in experience and grow our company. This title will be available in just a few short months for all Wii U owners to play if we can reach our goal! There are not too many games out for the Wii U yet, especially mystery horror games and we hope to shake up the landscape of the game selection with our newest title! We needed a title that was almost guaranteed to release on the system and soon for people to play and enjoy!
  • With contributor's help, you will give me the ability to upgrade to all the proper equipment to create a better and complete version of this game for the Nintendo eShop to try and make a difference on the market!

Funding Goals & Game Results

  • I need around 5,000 dollars to successful create and distribute this game! The funding will mainly be going towards the payment of the Wii U engine, but I am not allowed to say exactly what it costs! I am a licensed Nintendo Developer, but do not have the funds to pay to keep the Wii U game development engine. So if TreeFall Studios is going to put out Wii U games, we need the funding. The funds will also support myself and my team as we work to relaunch Forbidden Sanctity and start future projects.
  • We have cool perks for contributors to collect! The digital perks will be available for anyone in the world to receive! However, at the moment the game is scheduled to release for Nintendo of America, and no other regions however it is possible it will come to Nintendo of Europe later! Some of the perks given away will be computer wallpapers, digital soundtracks, and free game downloads! If you are interested in this game at all, there will be a good perk out there waiting for you!
  • This is a flexible campaign and if the goal is not met, the funds will still go towards completing this game! Development on this game has been going really well so far, and it needs the full funds to see completion, if not all the funds are raised, the collected funds will be used to finish the game and the engine will be payed for by some other means! So no matter what, I will finish this game and have it on the eShop for your enjoyment if funds are raised, completed or not! 

The game has only been in development for a few weeks and it is starting to turn out nicely! We hope you enjoy these early in-editor shots of the game!


8,000 Dollars

If we raise more than the goal, it will extend the length of the game and make the game's quality much better than before! It will not cut down on the development time however! The more money we raise, we will add DLC packs and other features to the game, not originally planned in the design, in which will be added in after the game releases! Basically, the more money raised, the better game you receive! :D

  • If you contribute you will help us complete a game, and change up the market on the Nintendo Wii U systems bringing a unique one of a kind experience to the new innovative system!
  • TreeFall Studios has had other successful projects in the past if you question our developmental credibility, we have had a two different Kickstarter projects that have been funded and we have also released another title without a funding campaign. The most notable of these projects, and my favorite game, is called The Gem Collector! You can check it out here: The Gem Collector

It would be a huge help if..

  • You share our campaign on your social media sites or just plain tell everyone you know!
  • You can like our Facebook page here: Facebook
  • You can follow us on Twitter here: Twitter
  • You can subscribe to us on YouTube here: YouTube

TreeFall Studios Insider Club Explanations

Status Seed  

If you reach the level of "Seed" status in our brand new TreeFall Studios Insider Club, you will recieve new game announcements, screenshots, special offers and news before anyone else in the world! It will be released to you through email before the media has even been notified! You can leak some of the announcements yourselves! Pretty Special!

Status Sapling  

If you reach the level of "Sapling" status in our brand new TreeFall Studios Insider club, not only will you have access to everything the Seed level recieves, but you will also have access to the first playable demos and betas before anyone in the world! You get to test games before IGN or GameTrailers!! Thats a pretty big honor, and on top of that, you will have even more special offers available to you that the Seed level cannot access or take advantage of, yea...that's right. Go on with your bad self, LEVEL UP!

Status Tree  

If you can reach the highest level of our brand new TreeFall Studios Insider Club, level "Tree" you are at the very top of the chain!! You will not only get everything that Sapling and Seed status recieves, but! Wait for it....are you ready? I don't really think so...but here it is anyway, you will recieve every single, EVERY SINGLE game we ever make in the future, for free. Yep, thats right, for free, and hopefully, that will be many, many, MANY, titles spreading across consoles, handhelds, and PCs. Yea, if you reach this status, just know, you, yea, YOU, are loved.

story:
Small team - Large passion

We are a small group of passionate old-skool adventure players. These last few years the adventure game market saw a huge revival. We are very happy with this and cant wait to play more of these games.
One big issue most of these revivals have is the fact that "swag" is only available when a project is trying to get funded on a crowdfunding website. This is why our small team wants to provide some swag to other enthusiastic adventure players in the form of t-shirts. If these t-shirts go over well we hope to expand and release more adventure related swag!

Risks & Challenges

Of course there are risks & challenges to any crowdfunding campaign. Our team consists of multiple people that have been involved with crowdfunding campaigns and know the potential pitfalls. We have deals in place with the artist (he's part of the team) and a t-shirt manufacturer that has multiple years of experience in the business. We are utilizing our own crowdfunding distribution system to make certain the delivery of the rewards will go smoothly.

story:
Right now, there isn't a single store in my area for gamers. We need somewhere to play, somewhere to hang out. We need somewhere to spend our afternoons and our money. We need a gaming store that's closer than an hour away.

My name is Will and I want to fill that need. I want to take an empty store front in a busy college town, and turn it into a friendly local gaming store.

I need start up funds for carpet and paint renovations, tables and chairs, gaming supplies like paint and glue, ccg supplies like sleeves and playmats, and most importantly the games!

I want to carry MTG, Warhammer, Dungeons and Dragons, YuGiOh, Pokemon, etc. The main goal I have is to provide a fun atmosphere for gamers to enjoy, both playing and just hanging out.

story:
Fun for all ages.
For 2-5 players.

Bluff smartly and advance through careful tactics to be the best master of the herd.

About me

Hello! I'm Brigitta Baltazisz from Budapest, Hungary.
(Board and card game designer.)

It’s my passion to develop parlor games, invent their stories, than creating all the graphics for the game.

My latest game is called Baa.., which is an easy and quick spaced card game.
The game has passed many tests in the past year and all the required graphics are play and print ready) cards, game rules, box). The cards are printed on casino-quality cardboards, to make them durable, so you can enjoy the game for a long time.
To make this game accessible for lots of families and friends to enjoy, I need support for financing the print process.

Plese check out the video, the pictures and the game description.
I hope you will like it and make a contribution to get this project done.

Thanks for visiting!
Briann Game

CARDS:
15 - black sheeps
5 - 5 blues sheeps 1, 2, 3
5 - 5 red sheeps 1, 2, 3
5 - 5 yellow sheeps 1, 2, 3
5 - 5 green sheeps 1, 2, 3
5 - 5 wolves 1, 2, 3
5 - 5 dogs 1, 2, 3
5 - 5 shepherds - 1, =, + 1

Altogether 120 cards, printed on casino-quality cardboards

Richly illustrated and detailed game rule

How good shepherd would you make?
How good could you protect your herd against the fierce attacks of the wolves?
Make your herd’s population as high as possible, but be aware of the possible wolf attacks!
You can never know which of your opponents is planning an attack against your herds, neither with how many wolves.

Make sure you always have sufficient dogs and a skilled shepherd to beat off the attacks.

The player gathering the most points from the herds before the deck is gone.

You can start crating your herds with a black sheep and with adding 3 sheeps of the same color. The multiplyer of the black sheep determines the value of the herd.

To have herds of a color that has already been put on the table, you can only use a black sheep card with a multiplier of 1 (1X).
You can use the wolves to attack the herds of other players. Dogs and shepherds will protect your herd. Their strength of defence depends on the multiplier values of the dogs and the skills of the shepherds.

GAME RULES

We can print the Baa... game with 120 cards.

We can print the Baa... poker game with 54 cards.

::::: ***If we collect $13,000 all supporters who funded the project with at least $50, will further receive an extra Baa poker game printed on casino quality cardboards. ::

The game can also be developed for
IOS and Adroid platforms.

 

If you join our herd, you will receive the following gifts

1. Yellow sheep - If you pledge $1 or more
One wallpaper with the game’s characters

2. Green sheep- If you pledge $10 or more
Print&Play version of Baa card game in printable pdf format (120 cards + Rulebook)
One wallpaper with the game’s characters

3. Blue sheep- If you pledge $20 or more
One Baa fridge magnet
Print&Play version of Baa card game in printable pdf format (120 cards + Rulebook)
One wallpaper with the game’s characters

4. Red sheep- If you pledge $35 or more
One set of Baa card game
Two wallpapers with the game’s characters

5. Super shepherd - If you pledge $50 or more
One sets of Baa card game
One Baa fridge magnet
Two wallpapers with the game’s characters

6. Alert dog - If you pledge $70 or more
Two sets of Baa card game
One Baa fridge magnet
Two wallpapers with the game’s characters

7. Hungry wolf- If you pledge $100 or more
Three sets of Baa card game
One Baa fridge magnet
Two wallpapers with the game’s characters

8. Black sheep - If you pledge $150 or more
One Baa t-shirts
Three sets of Baa card game
One Baa fridge magnet
Two wallpapers with the game’s characters

9. Complete herd - If you pledge $200 or more
Two Baa t-shirts
Three sets of Baa card game
One Baa fridge magnet
Two wallpapers with the game’s characters

10. Super Baa... - If you pledge $300 or more
Two Baa t-shirts
Five sets of Baa card game
One Baa fridge magnet
Two wallpapers with the game’s characters

11. Baa... Creator - If you pledge $600 or more
Your name will be displayed as a supporter
Two Baa t-shirts
Ten sets of Baa card game
Two Baa fridge magnet
Two wallpapers with the game’s characters

story:
Main Goals

  1. Raising 3,000$ in order to buy a professional license of Unity 3D.

  2. Getting 100 likes on Facebook.

Help us to get to our goals and you won't regret it :) .

 

New idea

I also have a new idea for the game.

First of all I'm going to make this game into an RPG.
Secondly, in order to make it a little bit more fun, I'm thinking of introducing pirates into the game. I've got this idea when i was talking with my friends. Pirates would steal the fish and damage the boats. In order to stop this, it will be possible to hire some mercenaries to protect the boat.

So I will be waiting for your feedbacks about this ideas in the comment section and if it will be some positive ones I want to start implementing it as soon as I finish the 0.6 version. I am already working with a graphic artist for releasing the new game which is going to be far better.

Waiting for your opinions, let's make this work!

 

About "Oki Doki Boats" v.0.5

Oki Doki Boats is a game which simulates the ocean fishing.

It's similar to Hard Truck but with fishing companies. The main difference is that the gameplay involves boats instead of trucks.

Operating system : currently only works on Windows but wish to extend it on *different platforms.

This game is being developed using Unity 3D game engine.

  

What we wish to accomplish?

The game is in its beginning stage. In the end we want to have a better resemblance to Hard Truck relating the distributing of cargo. In Oki Doki Boats this system will involve catching different species of fish and selling them or offering a certain ammount of it in exchange of rewards when the player finishes a task.

The world of the game will offer a lot of islands with many docks from which the player can get tasks. In these docks one can find NPCs which offer jobs for different companies.

Also we intend to make the game multiplayer so you can compete with your friends.

The final goal is to make the game available for different platforms.

 

Gameplay description

Coming soon!

 

Main Tasks

  • Code optimization.

  • Restyling the 3D models.

  • Adding more islands.

  • Making quests from NPC available to players.

  • Rethinking the game economics.

 

In current version the player can do the following

  • Fish
  • Sell the capture for rewards
  • Upgrade the boat attributes.
  • Explore the world.
  • See the NPC actions.

 

Future changes will come in version 0.6

  • Better shader for water
  • Resolve some language bugs
  • A new Boat model
  • Rebuild the GUI for all Screen resolutions
  • Some code optimization
  • Others

 

This game is free, anyone can have it by downloading it from gallery

or

Here is the DOWNLOAD LINK for version 0.5 

 

About this campaign

This is a campaign for a free to play game, developed by 2 students and anyone who gives us a donation will be mentioned in the game credits. 

You can also contribute by giving a like on Facebook or Google+.

 

What will I do with the donations?

-  I will buy licenses for the following:

  • Autodesk 3D Max
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Unity 3D Pro license

-  I will buy new hardware for extending the game on *different platforms:

  • New PC
  • Graphic tablet
  • Others

-  I will hire 2D/3D artists to make more realistic assets for this game and  sound artist to make sound effects and original music. 

 

Coming soon with more informations!

Check our gallery, we have some screenshots there and Oki Doki Boats game client.

 

* Windows, Web, iOS and Android.

This game is being developed using Unity 3D game engine.
  
What we wish to accomplish?
The game is in its beginning stage. In the end we want to have a better resemblance to Hard Truck relating the distributing of cargo. In Oki Doki Boats this system will involve catching different species of fish and selling them or offering a certain ammount of it in exchange of rewards when the player finishes a task.
The world of the game will offer a lot of islands with many docks from which the player can get tasks. In these docks one can find NPCs which offer jobs for different companies.
Also we intend to make the game multiplayer so you can compete with your friends.
The final goal is to make the game available for different platforms.
 
Gameplay description
Coming soon!
 
Main Tasks


Code optimization.


Restyling the 3D models.


Adding more islands.


Making quests from NPC available to players.


Rethinking the game economics.

 
In current version the player can do the following

Fish
Sell the capture for rewards
Upgrade the boat attributes.
Explore the world.
See the NPC actions.
 
Future changes will come in version 0.6

Better shader for water
Resolve some language bugs
A new Boat model
Rebuild the GUI for all Screen resolutions
Some code optimization
Others
 
This game is free, anyone can have it by downloading it from gallery
or
Here is the DOWNLOAD LINK for version 0.5  
 
About this campaign
This is a campaign for a free to play game, developed by 2 students and anyone who gives us a donation will be mentioned in the game credits. 
You can also contribute by giving a like on Facebook or Google+.
 
What will I do with the donations?
-  I will buy licenses for the following:

Autodesk 3D Max
Adobe Photoshop
Unity 3D Pro license
-  I will buy new hardware for extending the game on *different platforms:

New PC
Graphic tablet
Others
-  I will hire 2D/3D artists to make more realistic assets for this game and  sound artist to make sound effects and original music. 
 
Coming soon with more informations!
Check our gallery, we have some screenshots there and Oki Doki Boats game client.
 
* Windows, Web, iOS and Android.

story:
Protoman 21xx Is a prequel to megaman x and the first fan game ever that can be played in a snes!!

what is lame about this is....it is very hard to program SNES GAMES :(, so i need a lot of freelancer asm geniuses to help me and well they charge a lot XD.

Where is the money Going:

So I might have to pay for programmers that know about assembly (do you know?, then message me), MIDI COMPOSERS (for new songs), sprite artists, C4 chips (these are chips that are only in x3, x2, donkey kong country, yoshis island etc) cgi artists, background artists, basically any Megaman fan can do something.THE CARTS ARE EXPENSIVE!!! Since i will be using c4 chips they wil be even more expensive, hence the goal. I will also pay capcom to be able to do these upgrades, i dont wanna get sued.

it will go TO the game (asm programmers, artists, Spriters, MIDI composition etc.) copyright, promo, getting rights from capcom ,cartridges , boxes, poster and stickers ...everything there is not cheap : D

I will go through any strom, rain or shine do anything for this proyect to prosper you have my word as a megaman fan, we shall give him his biirthday the way he deserves!!!

If you don't have money then , you can do more by entering my team and telling me if you programm asm, or draw, or do midis anybody can be a potential candidate for these two gems of games!!!....oh and yeah spread the word!!!

!

 Synopsis:

Protoman 21XX  - Protoman wakes up in x'era to his surprise with his reactor core weak, (low health) and only his proto Strike active when he suddenly is confused for a maverick and is hunted by X, Zero and other maverick hunters...sigma? In this game protoman has no choice but to ally himself with VILE. To try to survive and destroy all maverick hunters will he survive?


if you donate a dollar you will help since this proyect will spread around :) thank you!!!

story:
Languages:

  1. Português
  2. English

 

 

The revolutionary virtual reality game that transports you into a zombie apocalypse.

 

=======================================================

Olá pessoal! Queria dizer que o Indie Go Go foi uma experiência incrível que nos trouxe muitas coisas boas, como novos parceiros, grandes notícias, muitos comentários positivos  e em especial o apoio das pessoas que curtiram a proposta. Infelizmente, o processo era muito mais complexo do que supúnhamos, e não deu tempo de fazer uma boa divulgação. Então, com base no que aprendemos, vamos planejar minuciosamente uma nova campanha com melhor material promocional, demos, mais prêmios e uma divulgação ampla pré-programada. Daremos continuidade ao processo iniciado aqui até podermos concluir o jogo. Mas aqueles que contribuíram desde já  ganharão um prêmio especial supressa exclusivo, aguardem! Muito obrigado novamente a todos que nos tem dado força, nos veremos em breve! Acompanhe  as novidades

======================================================

 

 

 

Inside The Horror Game

You Are Surrounded is a virtual reality (VR) horror game for iOS and Android that will change your ideas about gameplay forever.  The tablet (or smartphone) works as a window 1-1 to a virtual environment filled with hungry zombies. The player literally rotates 360 to look around the environment, or points the device up or down to aim his gun in the desired direction, as a real and visceral  shootout. You train your aim and reflexes using the motion control inside a real zombie apocalypse for the first time.

 

Upon request, the game will also be adapted for Windows Phone and PC!

 

Follow us on Facebook and you will be game tester =)

 

The player literally rotates 360 to look around the environment

 

Feel The Fear Firsthand

You can physically move to dodge the fatal bites, the software will detect your linear acceleration, tracking the camera's optical flow. Take a few steps in the real world, to walk in the game arena.  No virtual joystick is needed (only optional). Do not panic, deviate from the undead and kill them, explore small and dark rooms, collect bloodied items, solve mortal puzzles. You enter truly into the new game world like a nightmare - an incredible immersion in a VR survival zombie game far ahead of its time! Live through.

In addition, the game implements an innovative optimization technology  to generate ultra-realistic graphics (inspired by Call of Duty MW) even on limited mobile hardware.

You will be warned by shadows on the floor when a zombie approaches behind of you. With headphone you will hear screams and steps by  left or right, and turn quickly. Use your senses to survive like never before in a game.

Realism, controls, sounds, ambiance, all elements of game design are there for you finally discover how you would feel in an experience of being surrounded by the living dead and fight for their survival.

Ultra-realistic graphics on mobile hardware

 

We Love Truly Immersive Virtual Reality

We love the immersion afforded by motion controls, since the lasergun in arcades until tablets, Wii and Kinect. Accordingly, You're Surrounded enables you actively progressing in a relevant skill of shooting as a sport physical. The virtual reality sensation is like a futuristic head-tracking glasses, but immediately available.

Wii, Kinect and smartphones are the prelude to the Matrix

 

We Love Zombies

And we love zombies, like so many others. The world and the situations of the game are faithful to clime in productions like The Walking Dead and Romero's films . The gameplay cause  panic like in Resident Evil 4 and  fear as the  Resident Evil 2. 

The zombies come by sneaky places

 

STRETCH GOALS!

$72,000 - 360 Vision

Several arenas / stages:  cities, schools, cemetery, shopping centers, supermarkets, churches... Different ways to interact with scenario and various mutant zommbies:  crawling, air, leaping, big, soaring walls ... coming behind the wreckage. Global ranking and ranking among friends. Between a level (area) to another, cut-scenes tell the story (like Infinity Blade).  The money and resources you find in each area are used to buy new weapons, upgrades to their weapons (vests, rifles, grenades, swords, bazookas,,,) like the merchant in Resident Evil 4.

 

These creatures (selling in TuboSquid) and many others will enter the game, if funded, 

 

$90,000 - Camera Face Tracking

You'll be able to dodge the blows of zombies moving your head. Or take cover behind a low wall and get up at the right moment to shoot. All of this by a system that can track your face's position and change the view in game

 

 

$125,000 - Multiplyer Local (via Bluetooth)

You can call a friend to help you in the campaign. You will be able to play co-op multiplayer with your friend in the same place, one will protect the rear of the other, while competing for resources and points.

 You can buy weapons and evolve them as in RE 4

 

$210,000 - Real Walking

You will walk in small arenas moving physically in the real world. Divert yourself from zombies quickly and find the best position to hit him. Its linear acceleration is detected by the optical flow of camera. A full VR immersion experience in post-apocalyptic world.

 

$340,000 - Linear FPS Levels

Liner FPS levels explored by virtual joystick or real player moviment in a open field!

 

$410,000 - Adventure Mode

Horror non-linear exploration. Explore small rooms, collect items, solve puzzle and kil zombies, in classic ou VR walking mode.

 

Exclusive T-shirt You Are Surrounded for survivors

 

$630,000 Story / Decision Mode

Kill zombies pursuing the fleeing survivors or kill the survivor to distract the zombies, you choose. Make alliances or make enemies, but choose carefully who to trust. Several bifurcations in history like Telltale The Walking Dead, using motion control in interactive scenes.

 

 

$780,000 - AR mode - Augmented Reality

Turn your own home into a zombie battlefield!

 

 

$1,200,000 - Multiplayer Online

Online deathmatch  between teams in  FPS maps full of zombies. If you play in an open field, you will walk, aim and shoot like you're truly inside the game!

 


The creature wants your life more than you

 

Join us in this movement to raise gaming to a new paradigm!

 

 

 

 ======================================================================

 

Languages:

  1. Português
  2. English

 

O game revolucionário de realidade virtual que coloca você dentro de um apocalipse zumbi!

 

=======================================================

Olá pessoal! Queria dizer que o Indie Go Go foi uma experiência incrível que nos trouxe muitas coisas boas, como novos parceiros, grandes notícias, muitos comentários positivos  e em especial o apoio das pessoas que curtiram a proposta. Infelizmente, o processo era muito mais complexo do que supúnhamos, e não deu tempo de fazer uma boa divulgação. Então, com base no que aprendemos, vamos planejar minuciosamente uma nova campanha com melhor material promocional, demos, mais prêmios e uma divulgação ampla pré-programada. Daremos continuidade ao processo iniciado aqui até podermos concluir o jogo. Mas aqueles que contribuíram desde já  ganharão um prêmio especial supressa exclusivo, aguardem! Muito obrigado novamente a todos que nos tem dado força, nos veremos em breve! Acompanhe  as novidades

 

======================================================

 

Dentro do Horror Game

You Are Surrounded é um horror game de realidade virtual (VR) pra iOs e Android que vai mudar seus conceitos sobre gameplay para sempre. O tablet (ou smartphone) funciona como uma janela 1-1 para um ambiente virtual repleto de zumbis famintos.  O jogador literalmente gira 360 pra olhar ao redor e aponta o dispositivo para cima ou para baixo, mirando sua “arma” na direção almejada, igual um tiroteio real e visceral.  Treine sua mira e reflexos, viva um verdadeiro apocalipse zumbi pela primeira vez!

 

E para não deixar nenhum fã dos horror games de fora You Are Surrounded também faremos uma adaptação para Windows Phone e PC!

 

Curta nossa página no Facebook e seja tester do game =)

 

O player literalmente gira 360 para olhar ao redor da cidade

 

Sinta o Medo em Primeira-Mão

 

Você pode se mover fisicamente pra se desviar de mordidas: o jogo detecta sua aceleração linear pelo fluxo ótico da câmera. Dê alguns passos no mundo real para andar no mundo do jogo, nenhum joystick é necessário (só opcional). Não entre em pânico, desvie das criaturas e mate-as, explore salas pequenas e escuras, colete itens ensanguentados, resolva puzzles mortais. Você adentra no novo mundo do jogo como um pesadelo – uma imersão incrível em um VR zombie game muito a frente do seu tempo.  Sinta na pele a adrenalina!

Além disso, o game implementa uma tecnologia inovadora de otimização para gerar gráficos ultra-realistas (inspirados em Call of Duty MW) mesmo hardwares móveis limitados.

Sombras no chão te avisam quando um zumbi está se aproximando atrás do seu pescoço. Usando fones de ouvido, você pode ouvir gritos e passos ensandecidos vindos da esquerda ou direita e girar rapidamente atirando. Use seus sentidos para sobreviver como nunca antes em um game.  

Realismo, controles, sons, ambientação, todos os elementos de game design estão lá para você finalmente saber como você se sentiria em uma experiência de estar cercado por mortos vivos e lutar pela sua sobrevivência.

Gráficos ultra-realistas em hardware mobile.

 

Nós Amamos Imersão de Verdade.

Nós amamos a imersão oferecida por controles de movimento, desde as pistolas laser dos árcades até tablets, Wii e Kinect. Nesse sentido, You Are Surrounded permite você progredir ativamente em uma habilidade relevante de tiro como um esporte físico. A sensação de realidade virtual é como um óculos head-tracking futurista, porém imediatamente acessível.

 

Wii, Kinect and smartphones are the prelude to the Matrix

 

Nós Amamos Zumbis

E nós amamos zumbis, como tantas outras pessoas. O mundo e as situações do game são fiéis ao clima de produções como The Walking Dead e os filmes do Romero. O gameplay provoca pânico como Resident Evil 4 e medo como Resident Evil 2.

Os zumbis surgem dos escombros e dos cantos escuros.

 

STRETCH GOALS!

$72.000 – Visão 360

Muitas arenas / estágios: cidades, escola, cemitério, shopping center, supermercado, igreja… Diferentes modo de interagir com o cenário e derrotar os vários tipos de zumbis mutantes: rastejantes, corredores, saltadores, que escalam as paredes e o teto…. Ranking global e entre amigos do Facebook. Entre um level (área) e outro cut-scenes contam a história (como em Infinity Blade). O dinheiro e recursos que você saqueia em cada área são usados para comprar novas armas, fazer upgrades nos equipamentos (coletes, rifles, granadas, espadas, lança-míssel...) como o mercador em Resident Evil 4.

 

Essas criaturas (a venda no TurboSquid), e muitas outras vão entrar no game, se financiado.

 

$90.000 - Camera Face Tracking

Movendo a cabeça, você poderá desviar e se desviar dos golpes dos zumbis. Ou se agachar atrás de um muro,  e esperar o momento certo para se levantar e atirar. Graças a um sistema capaz de reconhecer a posição da sua face e mudar o ponto de visão no jogo.

 

$125.000 - Multiplyer Local (via Bluetooth)

Você poderá reunir os amigos em jogar um multiplayer cooperativo conectados no mesmo local, um protegendo a retaguarda do outro, enquanto competem por recursos e pontos.

 Você poderá comprar armas e evolui-las como em RE 4


$210.000 -Caminhada Real

Você poderá andar em pequenas arenas se movendo fisicamente no mundo real. Desvie-se dos zumbis rapidamente e encontre a melhor posição para atirar. Sua aceleração linear será detectada pelo fluxo óptico da câmera. Uma completa experiência de imersão  em um mundo pós-apocalíptico virtual

 

 

 

340.000 – Levels Lineares de FPS

Fases semi-lineares de FPS exploradas por um direcional virtual ou pelo movimento real do jogador em um campo aberto!

 

$410.000 - Adventure Mode

Exploração não-linear de horror. Vasculhe pequenas salas, colete itens, resolva puzzles e mate zumbis, do jeito clássico ou caminhando realmente pelo ambiente assustador.

 

Camiseta Exclusiva You Are Surrounded


$630.000 Modo História / Decisão

Mate os zumbis que perseguem um sobrevivente ou mate o sobrevivente fugitivo para distrair os zumbis, você ecolhe. Faça alianças ou inimigos, mas escolha com cuidado em quem confiar. Várias bifurcações na história como The Walking Dead da Telltale, usando o controle de movimento nas cenas virtuais interativas.

 

 

$789.000 – AR Mode – Realidade Aumentada.

Transforme sua própria casa em um campo de batalha zumbi!

 

 

$1.200.000 - Multiplayer Online

Mata-mata online entre times em mapas de FPS infestados de zumbis. Se você estiver em um campo aberto, poderá  andar, mirar e atirar como se estivesse realmente dentro do jogo!

 


A criatura deseja a sua vida mais do que você mesmo

 

 

 

Notícias

  • Brasileiro cria shooter de zumbis com gráficos de ponta para tablets - Tech Tudo
  • Neste game brasileiro de realidade virtual, você vai ficar cercado por zumbis --Superinteressante
  • You Are Surrounded: game nacional tem zumbis e realidade virtual - Tec Mundo
  • You’re Surrounded! O game realista de apocalipse Zumbi! - Gamestroming
  • Neste game brasileiro de realidade virtual, você vai ficar cercado por zumbis - GameVicio
  • Brasileiro cria jogo de zumbi bastante realista - Universo Zumbi

 

 

Junte-se a nós nesse movimento para ascender os games para um novo paradigma!

 

 

 OBS.: Atendendo a pedidos, para quem prefere não usar cartão de crédito, adicionamos um botão próprio de doação do Paypal que aceita a moeda brasileira. As recompensas são as mesmas!
