story:
G.H.O.S.T. is a free to play mobile game. This future fantasy, top down shooter offers a large variety of choice in both combat and narrative as the two weave together to create a near infinite number of unique, epic experiences, allowing you to live the story your way.

The Milky Way Galaxy, in the 31st century, found us helping create an entente with various alien species.  In a collaborated effort of peace, we entered into a contract that states that all within the alliance of HIVE are all devoted to each other and each other’s citizens. As a condition of this pact, HIVE created a space station were each nation sends civilians to live in harmony with one another, or at least that is the idea. The rest of the story is entirely up to you.

  • This game measures how kind, loyal, and how moral your decisions are. Playing the hero doesn’t make you a nice person, and being loyal to a slaver isn’t moral.
  • Going into a mission is always easier with the right information. Purchasing maps, talking with locals, and surveying the area can turn the tides of battle.
  • Fight from the ground or from space as you tackle missions from multiple angles.
  • Choose your side from dozens of conflicts.  Decide whether to fight or see if your words can sway enemies to your side.

As you can see your decisions, your methods, and even your mannerisms decide how the entire story unfolds. No matter how often you play the game, or even watch this game’s streams, you won’t likely see or play the exact same game or story more than once.

You will meet interesting people of various races, study exotic creatures and habitats, and resolve conflicts your way. As you explore and learn more about the galaxy, new and rewarding paths may open up to you. 

  • Exploring alien cultures helps you understand their weaknesses and strength.
  • Find what plants and animals can be used for food, medicine, or camouflage.
  • Find out what makes wildlife tic, explore their caverns, or have them combat threats.
  • Find unique upgrades to your arsenal.
  • Learn new languages to help you with trade or your missions. 

  • One of the most challenging decisions we faced when designing this game was character customization and playability. We have made it so you can only be a human, and made it to where you only played as your character. This is YOUR story.
  • We have given you full control over the game, and the story, with no cut scenes. Nearly every aspect of this game is playable.
  • There are a lot of side characters and stories and exposition is often the best way to tell them, but instead we have G.H.O.S.T. stories, special missions that break all of the rules I just told you. These are optional missions where you play as the storyteller and witness their story through game play. 

When we designed this game, these three words helps shape every level, every mission, every conversation that we make. This is our level design creed. These rules take each level and make it where every time you play, every time you watch a stream of this game, it will be different.

  • The choices open to you are immense. Sometimes the choices define others too. Your reputation will impact which characters you can interact with, and how they interact with you.
  • Life moves on as you embark on your journey.  G.H.O.S.T. takes place in a living, breathing world which changes regardless of your involvement, changing with every planet you visit, and every choice you make.
  • In this game you don’t retry. Whether you win, loose, are imprisoned, or retreat, the story continues.  Death isn’t the end, but instead the beginning of a different solution.  

Everything that we have spoken about so far, which is no small amount, is just for the single player. Now here is everything we have for the multiplayer.

  • Drop In/ Drop Out Coop: Play by yourself or with up to three friends as you carry experience and loot with you.
  • Arenas: We have three in game arenas that are worked out for the multiplayer experience where new challenges can be completed for new rewards.
  • Reworked Maps: We have reworked the planets in game into great multiplayer arenas for all types of game modes from classic death match to battle royal to brand new modes.
  • International Tournaments: We will host tournaments to find the best players. We will offer rare and new weapons special for these tournaments.

We feel a responsibility to do everything we can to help out other people. We will be hosting tournaments, with an entry fee, where all the proceeds go towards the charities that we are forming relationships with. We have a relationship with MD Anderson, the leading cancer research center in the world and hope to develop more, even asking you for suggestions.

  • Golin ball is one of several mini games that can be enjoyed alone, with friends, or even as a tournament for charity.
  • We want everyone to have the chance to experience our world and the stories within it. As such we are working on a special mode for those that do not play games, but instead can explore the world and live through the stories it offers without the combat.
  • We have planned DLC packages for both the single and multiplayer games, and even have 2 sequels in the plan to give people more of what they already love.
  • We will be coming out of the gate streaming and eSports friendly.
  • Accessibility is an essential for me which is why the controls are carefully considered, the game is completely free for the Android and iOS, and a offer carefully considered difficulties for everyone. There will be ads and a few in app purchases, but no new content will need cash to be unlocked and above all NO LOOT BOXES!!!
  • We also want to make the gaming experience for the disabled exceptional.  We will include auditory and visual aids in the game, include options for larger text and notices, provide speech as text and vice versa, and a story mode for those just interested in the adventure.  As the community grows, we hope to add features for all to enjoy our game.

Thank you for coming to view this page. As you see we need $25,000 to complete the game.  This cash will be divided between our three teams, the programming team, the art team, and the writing team.  Each of these teams plays an essential part in completing their section of the game, but each team works together to make sure that not only each part is perfect, but also blends perfectly with the other parts.

However we can not get there without your help.

Every page view, social media share, and dollar makes a difference to helping us get to our cash goal and just getting the exposure we need. We have a $1 perk where your name goes into the credits. If you think this game looks even remotely interesting, drop a dollar. Change from your grocery trip or laundry cash are happily accepted, but above all, tell someone else about this. Share this page, like our content, and take just one person who has a smartphone and ask them to drop just $1 on this page.

Indiegogo's website measures how many times the short link is shared, how many comments I get on my page, and how many answers and updates I give.  This all helps push us to the front page.  So please come in, leave a comment, and if you can, a dollar would help as well.

We have a flexible funding goal set up, this means that if we do not make our goal, we keep the money.  However that doesn't mean it is over.  We will take what we get, put it towards the game, and come back with a better project to crowdfund the rest.  Nothing goes to waste and all perks carry over.

Follow us on every social media page you can and get on our discord channel. We will be dropping news here, but also hosting events and Q and As so be ready to not only be apart of the game, but also a part of the community.

Thank you for your help in keeping the galaxy safe, and welcome to G.H.O.S.T.

As with any game, there are no guarantees. There are risks and pitfalls that all developers run into. We have analyzed the most common of these though, and have done the best we can to prevent these.

Scope Creep: Scope creep is a huge reason why games fail. Games are cool. As developers work on a project, they start to see more and more potential for cool stuff in their game. All of a sudden they end up with a bloated nightmare of additional features and content, and eventually the project collapses under its own weight. 
Our Solution: We have firmly established what will be in this game. No new mechanics will be added. This doesn't mean there's not room to evolve, but monetary and time limitations are clear to us. If we do have a great idea, we'll save it for a sequel. 

Budget Overreach: Even when the risks of scope/feature creep are eliminated, emergencies pop up, and sometimes, budget meant for one part of the game needs to be shuffled to another. 
Our Solution: By designing the game planet by planet, we've ensured development is modular. We intend to have 20 planets at launch, with even more available as DLC. However, the game will be complete, playable, and fun with only 3 planets- as long as our budge covers those locations, we'll have an amazing game for you. Everything else is icing on the cake!

Timeline:  We do not have a timeline to share yet.  We are incredibly early in the development cycle and we don't want to make promises we can not keep.  That being said, the mechanics of the game are decided on and no new major features will be added.  My team is devoted, passionate, and excited for the project, and is an amazing team.  I am very lucky to have stumbled upon every one of them.  The discussions that the team has had puts this game development between a year and a year and a half, just to make sure it is done the right way. However early releases and delays happen, but we will keep you all updated every step of the way with weekly progress videos, social media chats, discord discussions, and prizes along the way.

The amount of luck required to put together a team, being at the right place at the right time with the right project with the right ad, is insane.  The amount of luck required to have that team be a passionate network of people that work together beautifully and do an amazing job, is even more, and yet that is what we have here.

$25,000- Pulling back from our $50,000 goal, this new goal will cover the complete story and single player adventure and cover 10 planets.

$50,000- So $50,000 is now a stretch goal. This goal covers the main story line as well as the story mode we have for those less interested in games. This should cover our planned 20 original planets.

$100,000- Our goal with mobile phones was to make this game freely accessible to all, however some people prefer a larger screen. This goal will take our game and help us port it over to Steam which, just like the mobile version, will be completely free.

$150,000- We want people to enjoy our game, not just alone, but also together. This stretch goal will allow us to put up to 4 player co op within the game as your friends take over as your squad mates.

$200,000- In addition to Steam, we also want to push this game to those on PS4. XBox, and the Nintendo Switch. This stretch goal will allow us the ability to optimize this game for those systems.

$250,000- Lastly we would love this game to have a full voice cast. This is not cheap, and we hope to be able to be able to hire those who not only voice their characters, but become them to really bring this story to life.

$300,000- As our final stretch goal, we would love to have DLC. DLC is something we want to continually do for this game till the sequel is done, but first we must focus on the main game and wait for the money to develop more to come in. This stretch goal means we can have DLC ready for launch without waiting for the income to do it. This DLC shows where Earth's most powerful magic is as the gates to the fairy realm is opened and stories both old and new come with their own challenges.

This Kickstarter page isn't just a marketing tactic for us, but an event.  This next month we will be doing weekly updates, frequent videos, and fun community challenges, starting with this.  In order to build our community, up we will be hosting rewards as we make progress in building our Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook pages, each one revealing levels 1, 2, or 3 for an in game weapon for each social media page.  We will be revealing these as our community grows.  Good luck and have fun.
story_txt:
G.H.O.S.T. is a free to play mobile game. This future fantasy, top down shooter offers a large variety of choice in both combat and narrative as the two weave together to create a near infinite number of unique, epic experiences, allowing you to live the story your way.The Milky Way Galaxy, in the 31st century, found us helping create an entente with various alien species.  In a collaborated effort of peace, we entered into a contract that states that all within the alliance of HIVE are all devoted to each other and each other’s citizens. As a condition of this pact, HIVE created a space station were each nation sends civilians to live in harmony with one another, or at least that is the idea. The rest of the story is entirely up to you.
This game measures how kind, loyal, and how moral your decisions are. Playing the hero doesn’t make you a nice person, and being loyal to a slaver isn’t moral.
Going into a mission is always easier with the right information. Purchasing maps, talking with locals, and surveying the area can turn the tides of battle.
Fight from the ground or from space as you tackle missions from multiple angles.
Choose your side from dozens of conflicts.  Decide whether to fight or see if your words can sway enemies to your side.
As you can see your decisions, your methods, and even your mannerisms decide how the entire story unfolds. No matter how often you play the game, or even watch this game’s streams, you won’t likely see or play the exact same game or story more than once.You will meet interesting people of various races, study exotic creatures and habitats, and resolve conflicts your way. As you explore and learn more about the galaxy, new and rewarding paths may open up to you. 
Exploring alien cultures helps you understand their weaknesses and strength.
Find what plants and animals can be used for food, medicine, or camouflage.
Find out what makes wildlife tic, explore their caverns, or have them combat threats.
Find unique upgrades to your arsenal.
Learn new languages to help you with trade or your missions. 

One of the most challenging decisions we faced when designing this game was character customization and playability. We have made it so you can only be a human, and made it to where you only played as your character. This is YOUR story.
We have given you full control over the game, and the story, with no cut scenes. Nearly every aspect of this game is playable.
There are a lot of side characters and stories and exposition is often the best way to tell them, but instead we have G.H.O.S.T. stories, special missions that break all of the rules I just told you. These are optional missions where you play as the storyteller and witness their story through game play. 
When we designed this game, these three words helps shape every level, every mission, every conversation that we make. This is our level design creed. These rules take each level and make it where every time you play, every time you watch a stream of this game, it will be different.
The choices open to you are immense. Sometimes the choices define others too. Your reputation will impact which characters you can interact with, and how they interact with you.
Life moves on as you embark on your journey.  G.H.O.S.T. takes place in a living, breathing world which changes regardless of your involvement, changing with every planet you visit, and every choice you make.
In this game you don’t retry. Whether you win, loose, are imprisoned, or retreat, the story continues.  Death isn’t the end, but instead the beginning of a different solution.  
Everything that we have spoken about so far, which is no small amount, is just for the single player. Now here is everything we have for the multiplayer.
Drop In/ Drop Out Coop: Play by yourself or with up to three friends as you carry experience and loot with you.
Arenas: We have three in game arenas that are worked out for the multiplayer experience where new challenges can be completed for new rewards.
Reworked Maps: We have reworked the planets in game into great multiplayer arenas for all types of game modes from classic death match to battle royal to brand new modes.
International Tournaments: We will host tournaments to find the best players. We will offer rare and new weapons special for these tournaments.
We feel a responsibility to do everything we can to help out other people. We will be hosting tournaments, with an entry fee, where all the proceeds go towards the charities that we are forming relationships with. We have a relationship with MD Anderson, the leading cancer research center in the world and hope to develop more, even asking you for suggestions.
Golin ball is one of several mini games that can be enjoyed alone, with friends, or even as a tournament for charity.
We want everyone to have the chance to experience our world and the stories within it. As such we are working on a special mode for those that do not play games, but instead can explore the world and live through the stories it offers without the combat.
We have planned DLC packages for both the single and multiplayer games, and even have 2 sequels in the plan to give people more of what they already love.
We will be coming out of the gate streaming and eSports friendly.
Accessibility is an essential for me which is why the controls are carefully considered, the game is completely free for the Android and iOS, and a offer carefully considered difficulties for everyone. There will be ads and a few in app purchases, but no new content will need cash to be unlocked and above all NO LOOT BOXES!!!
We also want to make the gaming experience for the disabled exceptional.  We will include auditory and visual aids in the game, include options for larger text and notices, provide speech as text and vice versa, and a story mode for those just interested in the adventure.  As the community grows, we hope to add features for all to enjoy our game.
Thank you for coming to view this page. As you see we need $25,000 to complete the game.  This cash will be divided between our three teams, the programming team, the art team, and the writing team.  Each of these teams plays an essential part in completing their section of the game, but each team works together to make sure that not only each part is perfect, but also blends perfectly with the other parts.However we can not get there without your help.Every page view, social media share, and dollar makes a difference to helping us get to our cash goal and just getting the exposure we need. We have a $1 perk where your name goes into the credits. If you think this game looks even remotely interesting, drop a dollar. Change from your grocery trip or laundry cash are happily accepted, but above all, tell someone else about this. Share this page, like our content, and take just one person who has a smartphone and ask them to drop just $1 on this page.Indiegogo's website measures how many times the short link is shared, how many comments I get on my page, and how many answers and updates I give.  This all helps push us to the front page.  So please come in, leave a comment, and if you can, a dollar would help as well.We have a flexible funding goal set up, this means that if we do not make our goal, we keep the money.  However that doesn't mean it is over.  We will take what we get, put it towards the game, and come back with a better project to crowdfund the rest.  Nothing goes to waste and all perks carry over.Follow us on every social media page you can and get on our discord channel. story:
First of all, thank you for paying attention!

We're a bunch of friends who often play with Kevin in many different games, and we're getting tired of his pc being horribly slow. It is starting to be a huge issue since Kevin enjoys playing action RPGs in Hardcore mode and quite often dies, due to his computer crashing. Therefore we would like to collect money so we can buy him a new PC as a surprise for when World of warcraft, warlords of draenor is released. We know that lots of people are depending on him as a crucial part of wow guild raids, so this will also benefit some of you!

We will try to surprise him, so please try not to tell him about the project.


Why does he need this money?

He’s at the moment unemployed and therefore struggling with the money, so there’s no way Kevin would be able to afford a new computer on his own. In order for this to succed, we are aiming to raise 1300$ for a new computer. The computer that will be bought will be a laptop since that is what we know Kevin prefers. We have seen him in pain for far too long....


Stretch goals:

  • $1400 new headset!
  • $1500 New mouse!
  • $1550 New mouse mat!
  • $1700 Better GPU!
  • $1800 Better CPU!


If the goal isn't reached, we will proceed and buy the best possible laptop for the money raised.

story:
First, checkout our current site:

www.LanyardNetwork.com


About {LAN}YARD

We're a social network for PC Gamers but we imagine we're better than the current social networks you use. We don't keep track of the links you click, the friends  you have, the people you interact with, etc. Heck, we don't even want you to use your real name or picture. You use a profile name instead of your real name, you can use profile pictures/avatars that don't show your face. It could be a video game character or whatever you want it to be, without it being offensive.

We don't even know how we're going to make money on Lanyard Network other than a premium, affordable membership which is completely optional. Why? We don't have any advertisements whatsoever, no product placements, no intrusive ads, no ads in your feeds.

Free of advertising, free of social experiments, free of privacy issues and concerns. You’ll use a "profile name" instead of your real name, an avatar instead of a profile picture and limit who can see what. Of course we'll always be 100% FREE!


I have Steam, Reddit, etc.! Why Lanyard?

True but here's how we see it, we're trying to be the central hub between these already well-established communities. We often see people desperately trying to find other like-minded PC Gamers on Reddit, message boards, etc. Steam is great AFTER you already have the friends, we're trying to bring an easy to use service to find other PC Gamers to get your game one! It's not so easy to wonder around Steam and find other local gamers on Steam, or even international ones either. It's hard to find gamers with similar interests, etc. Now do you get Lanyard?


What we need:

So here's what we're looking to accomplish:

  • Marketing campaigns.
  • Promotions.
  • Giveaways.
All of the above should help us get some brand recognition out there on the internet. We're just looking to tackle an initial marketing campaign against the massive industry full of billion+ dollar companies. We're just a tiny indie team, so we need the help of the community to achieve this. We're trying to keep the site advert free and keep it 100% free forever. We're not looking to really make money with this concept, thus we have to receive help from the community. 
For us together makes it easier to "spread the pain" of the cost of expansion and marketing. Since we are only asking for $1,000USD we cannot really offer up cool prizes, t-shirts, merchandise, memberships, etc. 


But, what we CAN offer you:

  • A one year OR a never-expiring premium membership (Golden Lanyards) for our website, https://LanyardNetwork.com/
  • You listed on a page of everyone who contributed to this campaign. This list will be featured on our social network (website)!

    Broke? You can still help us!

    We realize not everyone can afford to give or help us right now and that's okay. We've all been there, some more than others! We completely understand your situation but you don't need to help out just by donating some actual cash!

    You can help by spreading the word about {LAN}YARD [https://LanyardNetwork.com] to your friend(s) and family member(s)! You can share this campaign specifically to Facebook, Twitter, message boards, Reddit, etc. to maximize our campaigns exposure to other like minded PC gamers out there!

    Any way to get the word out about our website and our campaign is more than enough to help us. If you can't donate, maybe one of your friends and/or followers can afford it right now. So we appreciate any effort on your behalf to expose us to more potential community members!

官方網頁 : http://rabiribi.kano-bi.com/tc/

Facebook (News,Fanart,Demo) : https://www.facebook.com/RabiRibiGame

If you have any question about Rabi-Ribi or this crowdfunding campaign,please free to contact us with E-mail, our address is  rabiribi@kano-bi.com

如對Rabi-Ribi或此募資有什麼問題,歡迎利用E-mail方式聯絡我們 : rabiribi@kano-bi.com

New items image updated!



 
「エリナとリボンの等身大抱き枕」& Tシャツ & マグカップ ラフは完成しました！このページの底で大きい画像がありますよ！

Here is the sample sketch of the hug pillow cover (160cm x 50cm) in Ultimate Hug PIllow Edition! Also the design of T-shirt and Mug are finished! For a larger size of the image please scroll to the bottom of this page.

 實體版超值包的等身抱枕(160cm x 50cm)草圖完成了! 還有T-Shirt和馬克杯的設計也完成了! 大圖可以在本頁底部看到喔!

ウサ耳娘を主人公にするゲームが欲しい、このゲームはそういうあなたに捧げますーーーーー2D横スクロールアクション　+　探索ゲーム
主人公「エリナ」は平和な日常を送る極普通のウサギです。ある日突然、彼女は見知らず土地で現れて、しかも人間になりました！目的のない旅の中、彼女は明るい可憐な妖精「リボン」と出会いました。
これで、二人の家を帰る旅が始まった。多分黒幕が探し出せますかな？ 

There is always not enough games with a bunny girl as the protagonist. So here is another one for all the bunny lovers — A 2D sidescrolling plus exploration platformer.

Erina, the protagonist ,was a normal rabbit that lived in a peaceful life …That was until one day, she found herself in an unknown place and noticed her apperance turned into a human.

During her aimless wandering , she meet the cheerful pink haired fairy – Ribbon, who, for some reason, want to stick with Erina.

Therefore, without any choices, an adventure of a bunny and a fairy searching for the way to home has started. And perhaps even finding out who is the reason of causing all of this trouble as well?

讓兔耳娘當主角的遊戲總是不嫌多，所以這是款獻給兔耳愛好者的遊戲 — 一款 2D 橫向捲軸 + 平台探險動作遊戲。
遊戲的主角，Erina，是一隻生活在寧靜生活的普通兔子… 直到那天，她發現她身在未知的地方且變成了人類。 經歷了沒有目的的流浪後，她遇見一隻活潑的粉髮妖精 – Ribbon，因為一些原因她決定跟隨 Erina。 在沒有選擇的情況下。一隻兔子和一隻妖精踏上了尋找家園的冒險。也許會找出這一切都是誰在搞鬼的說？


「ラビリビ」は2D探索横スクロールアクションゲーム、要するに固定のルートはありません。ゲーム中、次のエピソードへ行くヒントは与えますが、プレイヤー達はヒントを従う必要がありません。自分の想いでゲームの進行を調整できます。

プレイヤー達は近接攻撃を使ううさ耳娘「エリナ」と遠距離攻撃を使う妖精「リボン」を使えます
「エリナ」は普通のウサギから変化した人間ですので、強いパワーを持つとか期待しないてくださいね！
ですがゲームの進行と伴う、探索可能の領域が広くなり、「エレナ」と「リボン」の能力も成長します。
レベルアップと世界中に散った道具の収集によって、「エレナ」と「リボン」が新しいスキルと能力を覚えます。
当然道具を収集しなくでも大丈夫です。収集しなくでもクリアできます。

Rabi-Ribi is a 2D exploration platformer, that mean it is focus on non-linear gameplay. There will always be hints of where to go,but player never required to follow them, as most of the game can be completed in any order.

Player will play as the bunny protagonist, Erina., whose attacks are focus on close combat attack while Ribbon, the fairy, is the range attacker, she will follow Erina and indirectly controlled by player.
Erina is just a little rabbit that turned into a human, so don’t expect she can do anything super! And as the game keep processing, the area for exploring will be increase too.
New attacks and  abilities of both Erina and Ribbon can be  learnt and improved  by   collecting items and upgrade which are spreaded in every corner of the game world.
Any items in the game are optional to pick up, you can even try to beat  the game  in the hard way – without collecting any items!
Rabi-Ribi 是一款 2D 平台探險動作遊戲，意味著它是一款非固定路線的遊戲。劇情進行中會有提示玩家下一步該如何走，但玩家不必按照指示進行遊戲，遊戲可以按照玩家喜好順序去完成。

玩家將可以控制使用近戰攻擊的兔耳娘主角，Erina 。以及間接控制使用遠距離攻擊的 Ribbon 妖精。
Erina 只是一隻變成人類的普通兔子，所以不要以為她會做出什麼很強的東西啊！
不過隨著遊戲的進行，可探索的區域也會隨之增加，Erina 和 Ribbon 的能力也會漸漸提昇。
藉由收集和升級分布在世界角落的道具，Erina 和 Ribbon 可以學習新的攻擊和能力。
另外，由於遊戲沒有固定路線，所有道具都可以跳過的，也就是可以在不收集任何道具的情況下破關。



-　ウサギ
-　古めの2D探索横スクロールアクションゲーム
-　6種以上の難易度が選べる
-　8種類以上地区、総計20以上のマップが探索できる
-　ウサギだらけ
-　60種以上の道具と能力
-　20枚以上のメインキャライラストと多彩なイベンドイラスト
-　40体以上のボス、1000種類以上の攻撃モード（弾幕）
-　後日談、多分真のラスボスの予感！？
-　ボスラッシュ挑戦モード、次へと次に現れるボスを叩き潰せ！
-　スピードランモード、すべてのイベンドを消したモード。最速クリアを挑戦しよう！
-　使用できるキャラクター数名
-　オリジナル曲40曲以上
-　英語、繁体字中国語と日本語対応
-　たくさんかわいいウサギ

  • A bunny-themed retro style exploration platformer
  • Fast-paced 2D action with full of animated sprites
  • 3+  difficulty settings for different types of player
  • 8+ main areas and 20+ sub areas to explore
  • Bunny 
  • Over 60 items and upgrades
  • Over 20 fully-illustrated characters, with lots of cutscene illustration
  • 40+ boss battles, 1000+ attack patterns with Boss Rush Mode to fight some or all of them in a row. 
  • Post game story and contents , also speedrun mode that take out every section of the game that the player cannot control the main character. 
  • Multiple playable characters (Working in Progress)
  • Over 40+ original music 
  • English,Chinese and Japanese support 
  • Bunny

    • – 兔子
    – 復古風格的平台探索動作遊戲
    – 6 種以上的難度選項給不同程度的玩家
    – 8 種以上的主地區，以及 20 種以上的子地區可供探索。
    – 一堆兔子
    – 超過 60 種道具和能力
    – 超過 20 隻主要角色以及多樣 CG
    – 40 種以上的Boss戰鬥，1000 種以上的BOSS攻擊模式/彈幕。
    – 後日談，收錄劇情結束後的故事，或許是真BOSS的預感!?
    – Boss Rush 挑戰模式，擊敗接踵而來的BOSS關卡。
    – Speedrun 模式，去除所有故事的劇情畫面，挑戰最速破關時間。
    – 多位可使用角色
    – 超過 40 首原創曲目
    – 英文，繁體中文及日文語言
    – 一堆可愛的兔子



    「Kano-Bi」はインディーゲーム開発チーム！メンバーは香港と台湾から集まりました。ゲームのグラフィクは古めの8bitの感覚、かわいい画風と綺麗な弾幕で制作しました。
    「Kano-Bi」のプロデューサー、メインプログラマーとメインデザイナー：Gema Yue 八年以上にゲーム関係の仕事をやりました。
    「Magic Broom Shooting」と「Wizardry Magicization」のプログラム、グラフィックとステージデザインを全部一人でやりましたので、相当なファンを集めました。

    We're Kano-Bi!

    Kano-Bi is a Indie Game Team, our team members based on Hong Kong and Taiwan, we make games that combine Retro and Modern style.
    The hoster of Kano-Bi: Gema Yue, is a Programmer and Illustrator. Yue started writing Game Plugins and making games for 8 years, previous games like "Magic Broom Shooting" and "Wizardry Magicization" are made by Gema Yue himself solely ,including Programming, Graphics and Level Design, which gathared a huge number of fans for Kano-Bi.

    Kano-Bi 是獨立遊戲製作團隊！成員來自香港與台灣，遊戲風格融合了復古的 8 - bit 風格、日系畫風、絢麗的彈幕特效！

    Kano-Bi 的企劃主催、兼主程式、主美術：Gema Yue，從事遊戲相關差件、製作已經有八年的經驗了。之前的作品有「Magic Broom Shooting」、「Wizardry Magicization」之程式撰寫、美術繪製、關卡設計，皆為 Gema Yue 一手包辦。因此 Kano-Bi 吸引了相當大量的粉絲



    私たちはすべてのプレイヤーを完全なる「ラビリビ」を楽しんていただきたいと思います！

    今「ラビリビ」の完成度は80％に着きましたが、まだまだ理想の完成度まで距離があります。
    私達は少しでも早く計画したサブクエスト、探索要素、成長装備、もっと多彩なゲーム体験ともっと豊富な戦闘内容を完成したいとおもいますので、どうかご支援のほど宜しくお願いいたします！

    We hope that everyone would enjoy Rabi-Ribi as we do!

    And we always want it to be better,but sadly it is impossible to be done with us alone.

    We've got a huge amount of original soundtrack, art work, promotion videos, with a really long development time yet without any income, it's hard for us to keep it going.

    that's why we need YOUR help.

    Every single penny you've spent won't be wasted.

    Here's the Budge Breakdown of how are we going to use these money.

    We sincerely hope you can be a part of us!

    我們希望所有玩家都能享受完整的 Rabi-Ribi ！
    製作團隊也希望呈現最完美的遊戲給所有玩家！
    目前已經完成相當大量的原聲帶、美術圖集、宣傳影片，
    也燃燒了不少開發金，即便所有劇情主線、遊戲機制、Boss 戰鬥、
    華麗的彈幕、豐富龐大的養成要素…完成度幾乎達８０％，

    距離作品完整仍還有段距離。
    若能護得更多開發金，將可以在更短的時間內完成原定企劃的數項支線任務、
    探索要素、更多的成長裝備、更完善的遊戲體驗與更豐富的戰鬥內容。

    也希望大家在使用贊助功能時，優先考慮的是是否願意幫助我們順利開發，
    而非考量贊助的額外Bouns（當然這是一種回饋！但並非募資的本體）。

    期待各位的參與！一起完成 Rabi - Ribi ！

ウサ耳娘を主人公にするゲームが欲しい、このゲームはそういうあなたに捧げますーーーーー2D横スクロールアクション　+　探索ゲーム
主人公「エリナ」は平和な日常を送る極普通のウサギです。ある日突然、彼女は見知らず土地で現れて、しかも人間になりました！目的のない旅の中、彼女は明るい可憐な妖精「リボン」と出会いました。
これで、二人の家を帰る旅が始まった。多分黒幕が探し出せますかな？ 

There is always not enough games with a bunny girl as the protagonist. So here is another one for all the bunny lovers — A 2D sidescrolling plus exploration platformer.
Erina, the protagonist ,was a normal rabbit that lived in a peaceful life …That was until one day, she found herself in an unknown place and noticed her apperance turned into a human.
During her aimless wandering , she meet the cheerful pink haired fairy – Ribbon, who, for some reason, want to stick with Erina.
Therefore, without any choices, an adventure of a bunny and a fairy searching for the way to home has started. And perhaps even finding out who is the reason of causing all of this trouble as well?

私たちはすべてのプレイヤーを完全なる「ラビリビ」を楽しんていただきたいと思います！今「ラビリビ」の完成度は80％に着きましたが、まだまだ理想の完成度まで距離があります。私達は少しでも早く計画したサブクエスト、探索要素、成長装備、もっと多彩なゲーム体験ともっと豊富な戦闘内容を完成したいとおもいますので、どうかご支援のほど宜しくお願いいたします！

We hope that everyone would enjoy Rabi-Ribi as we do!


And we always want it to be better,but sadly it is impossible to be done with us alone.
We've got a huge amount of original soundtrack, art work, promotion videos, with a really long development time yet without any income, it's hard for us to keep it going.
that's why we need YOUR help.
Every single penny you've spent won't be wasted.
Here's the Budge Breakdown of how are we going to use these money.
We sincerely hope you can be a part of us!

我們希望所有玩家都能享受完整的 Rabi-Ribi ！製作團隊也希望呈現最完美的遊戲給所有玩家！目前已經完成相當大量的原聲帶、美術圖集、宣傳影片，也燃燒了不少開發金，即便所有劇情主線、遊戲機制、Boss 戰鬥、華麗的彈幕、豐富龐大的養成要素…完成度幾乎達８０％，距離作品完整仍還有段距離。若能護得更多開發金，將可以在更短的時間內完成原定企劃的數項支線任務、探索要素、更多的成長裝備、更完善的遊戲體驗與更豐富的戰鬥內容。也希望大家在使用贊助功能時，優先考慮的是是否願意幫助我們順利開發，而非考量贊助的額外Bouns（當然這是一種回饋！但並非募資的本體）。期待各位的參與！一起完成 Rabi - Ribi ！




Hug Pillow Sketch 等身抱枕草圖  (160cm x 50cm)

story:
Be a part of the Musana Carts movement!

We are bringing innovative technology and opportunities for 10 million street vendors in crowded urban areas. 

We met Kizza, a hard working father of two, selling the most popular street food in Kampala: egg rolls. Musana Carts enables micro-entrepreneurs like Kizza to better provide for their families. Everyday Kizza sells 200 egg rolls, but takes home just $7. If he could increase his capacity, that number would go up.


Pimp Kizza’s Cart!
Kizza is up against a lot: poor energy infrastructure, the risks associated with operating illegally and inhaling dangerous fumes from his coal burning stove. We immersed ourselves in Kizza’s reality, and we developed his solution: the Musana Carts.
We brought this solution to the Hult Prize, the world’s largest start up accelerator. With 25,000 applicants from all over the world, we were thrilled to make it through the first two of three rounds. Now, we are amongst the final 6 teams to compete at the Clinton Global Initiative Annual Meeting in New York this coming September, where former President Bill Clinton will award the USD 1,000,000 Prize to the winning team.


Musana Carts are street vending carts which provide Kizza with solar energy on the go.



Musana Carts are modular, made for customization of business features including fridges, sockets and mobile money terminals. Beyond its features, Musana Carts equips its vendors with finance and business training and offers a path to legalization for those trapped in the informal sector.

There are 10,000 street vendors just like Kizza in Kampala today. Make a change in their lives with a donation to Musana Carts. Together we can start the Solar Street Vending Revolution!

Every dollar can make a difference

We met with Kizza and many others vendors during our field research in Uganda. We listened to their challenges and we built Musana Carts as the solution to help push them out of poverty and revolutionize their street vending enterprises. We want to design an easy to use cart equipped with the best features on the market that is completely self sustaining through the use of solar panels. 

By donating to our project, you will allow us to come back to Kampala and fulfill our promise made to our inspiration: the entrepreneurs in the streets 

“I’m working every night to pay my fees for University. I understood that life is a challenge, you cannot wake up in the morning and wait for a mango falling from the tree, you have to sweat and use your energy, to get what you want, it's the only way"

-Tom, 20 years, Chicken vendor, Wandegeya Market, Kampala, Uganda

“I’m working only in the morning, and my husband doesn’t work, still I succeed to feed my whole family, but I struggle, sometimes I’m waiting all the day for customers, I would like to have a way to reach them instead of sitting and waiting. ”

-Jocelyn, 26 years, Porridge vendor, pregnant, and mother of a 2yr old girl, Nakawa Market, Kampala, Uganda

“My main expense is to rent the fridge from the owner, I wish I could own one myself but I don’t have the capital to invest, it’s my only option”

-Aisha, 30 years old, Soda vendor, Nakasero Market, Kampala, Uganda 


We want to express our gratitude! 

$5 - Musana Carts Supporter - A big thank you from our team in Uganda! 

$20 - Musana Carts Community Member - You get listed on our website as a Musana Carts Community Member 

$30 - Solar Revolution Supporter  - Musana Carts official Tshirts shipped directly to your home (United States and Canada) 

$50- Solar Revolution Energy Commander - African Headband/ Bow-tie: Totally unique and handmade by Ugandan artisans just for you! (United States and Canada) 

$200 - Solar Revolution Technology Leader - African headband/bow-tie + Musana Tshirt + You get listed on our website + A postcard from the Musana team in Uganda ! (United States and Canada) 

$500 - Solar Revolution Change Maker - Sponsor one Musana Cart for a vendor! Musana Tshirt + Skype call with Founders in Uganda. We will send you pictures and updates of your sponsored cart with the vendors!

$1000 - Solar Revolution Change Maker - Sponsor two Musana Carts! You get Musana Tshirts +Very special mention on our website + Skype call with Founders in Uganda. Change the lives of several street vendors in Kampala! We will send you pictures and updates of your sponsored carts with the vendors! You can be a part of this transformative experience for the vendors and their families!



Musana Carts Impact



Financial impact: Each cart empowers vendors to reduce energy costs and save time, creating additional working hours to sell more products and increase their revenues.

Economic impact for the city of Kampala: Vendors will transition from the informal economy to become legal tax paying entrepreneurs. 

Environmental impact: Each cart saves 300 tons of carbon emissions every year!

Health impact: The elimination of smoke from cooking reduces charcoal smoke inhalation related diseases!

Energy impact: Musana Carts improves the access to electricity for all the workers within the markets.

Social impact: Musana Carts give access to business training and allow each vendor to invest in his/her livelihood leading to upward social mobility through entrepreneurship!

The story behind Musana Carts

Meet the team: Keisuke “Kei” Kubota, our friendly mechanical engineer, Manon Lavaud, our fearless leader, and Nataliey “Taliey” Bitature, our resident dreamer.

The three of us met among a wonderful tribe of passionate individuals studying Social Entrepreneurship at Hult International Business School in San Francisco. Surrounded by 63 fellow social entrepreneurs that share the same crazy idea of making the world a better place gave us the power to start Musana Carts. So far the journey has been inspiring, taxing and tremendous. We have learned to fail fast and fail forward, but more importantly that the key is to keep believing!


Money isn't everything: Other ways to contribute:

Share! Share! Share! Share!

Please share our story. Our team is completely dedicated to this project, and is humbly welcome to feedback/support/questions/meetings/research and of course, hugs!


Thank you!

story:
Indiegogo design by: Qubed Advertising



WHAT IS A FANCHISE?

fan·chise  /ˈfanˌCHīz/

noun

a professional sports team that provides its fans unparalleled control of, and access to, their sports entertainment experience; especially: the right to exercise the powers of a General Manager and Coach.

IS THIS A REAL TEAM IN A REAL LEAGUE?

YES! This is a real team in the Indoor Football League (IFL). You remember a guy by the name of Kurt Warner? This is the same league his team, the Iowa Barnstormers, is in. Think about it…one of the greatest QBs in NFL history played on a team in this league. That’s as real as it gets.

ARE ANY OF THE OTHER TEAMS IN THE LEAGUE RUN BY THE FANS?

NO. The Project FANchise team is the first fan-run professional team in the history of sports. So when we say join us and make history, we mean it. This is uncharted territory for everyone involved.

WHAT DO I GET TO VOTE ON?

The short answer… everything. You will choose the GM and coaching staff. You will scout and evaluate players and decide who makes the roster. You will choose the team name and team colors. You will design the logo and mascot. And best of all, you will call all the plays in real time! We really mean it, this is your team.

WILL MY VOTE ACTUALLY COUNT?

Absolutely. Everyone’s vote will count. We are building an app that will allow you to prove (and improve) your football knowledge. Everyone will start out as a rookie with the same influence on the team. As you increase your FanIQ (football knowledge) your voting power will increase.

WHO ARE YOU GUYS? CAN I TRUST YOU?

We are a group of former NFL players and front office vets, successful technology entrepreneurs, and investors that all believe fans deserve more than a “thank you” during a press conference. Feel free to contact any of us if you have questions. We could not be more excited to be doing this, and we thank you for helping us make it a reality!

IS THIS A FOOTBALL TEAM OR A TECHNOLOGY COMPANY?

BOTH! Project FANchise is actually two separate, distinct companies. The first, Project FANchise Technology, is focused on building a mobile technology platform to allow fans to run a real football team. The second, Project FANchise Team, is focused on building a world-class football organization that will look exactly like other IFL and even NFL organizations except that fans (like you!) will be making all the important decisions, while the people in the front office and on the field go out and execute exactly what the fans want.

WHY SHOULD I BACK THIS CAMPAIGN?

You mean aside from the fact that it's the greatest thing that's ever happened to sports? The fans that join now will be rewarded with more influence (voting power) on all team decisions. Everyone’s vote will count, but voting power will be based on a number of factors including how much you participate, your football knowledge, and the length of time you’ve been involved. The fans that join early and spend the time to help build and shape the team will be the leaders of a new type of fan…fans whose voice actually counts. #PowerToTheFANS

I WANT TO PLAY ON THE TEAM. HOW CAN I TRY OUT?

Back this campaign to secure yourself a tryout plus get early access to the app so you can vote for yourself to make the team. We will be holding a minimum of four tryouts across the country so unless you are from Finland there will be one close enough for you to drive.  Just remember the fans are going to be making the final decision on every roster spot, so your personality off the field is going to be just as important as your skills on it.

story:
Bring an exciting new rhythm  game to the best arcade.

Outside the USA amazing games exist that sadly never make their way to America's arcades.

  • The Break ( 8 on The Break) located just outside NYC in Dunellen New Jersey,  is the longest continually operated  arcade in the country. The arcade opened its doors in 1973. It has been under current management since 1985.
  • We know the community believes in The Break, and has long desired an Jubeat machine.
  • Together with the community, we can achieve the goal of bringing one of these machines to The Break.

Help us fund Jubeat

It's simple, help us and we will help you!

  • We  need $5,500 . This will cover the purchase and transportation from Japan, as well as local delivery.
  • Our perks are simple. For every amount you contribute, we will match it 100% in game tokens good on the Jubeat machine!
  • Contribute $10.00 we give you $20.00 in Jubeat  tokens good in this machine.  Contribute $20.00 we give you $40.00 in tokens, and so on. Once the machine is here you will be playing for 1/2 the price of those who did not contribute.

The Impact

The Break has always been on the cutting edge. With the power of our community behind us, we will be able to provide more and more games not available anywhere else  at the least expensive price.

Jubeat will be $.75 a play, BUT,  if you contribute, we double your contribution in tokens, you play for 50% less than everyone else.

The Good News!

It's already ordered and will be here Mid January 

Contribute today and play for half price when it arrives!

story:
Short Summary

Well, folks, it's been a long time coming, but now it looks like it's here: the WhoDrewThis Mega Minisplosion is upon us.

"What does that even mean?" you ask. "And who ARE you?" Alright, alright, hold your equines.

My name's Ashton Sperry, founder and contributor for Pathfinder Paper Minis, the paper miniatures line licensed by Paizo Publishing, creators of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. I also run a little DeviantART page under the alias WhoDrewThis that some folks may know me better for. As for the WhoDrewThis Mega Minisplosion? Well, that would be a compilation miniatures pack of a whole lotta art from my DeviantART page and unfinished home projects, converted into paper minis and arranged into one big miniature set. We're talking some 160+ minis- at least- and that's not even including the commissions available as Perks. This will be one big, big, BIG minis set, and it's only available here as part of this Indiegogo project.

So, I mentioned the commissions, yes? Each Perk above the first one will net you at least one commissioned mini of your choice. That's right: anything you want drawn and turned into a mini is yours. Your character and his or her buddies, their main villain, a mechanical turtle, an anthropomorphic ham sandwich- basically anything you want. Each additional person signing up for a Perk helps expand the set for everyone, so it's not a bad idea to get your friends in on the action.

In addition, at higher Perks, I'll start taking names for input regarding my long-awaited minis biz, Astounding Minis, designed for you and your fellow gamers to fit the odd niches in gaming we all love. Lovecraftian horror? I can do that. Post-apocalyptic wasteland? Yup. Victorian steampunk? Why but of course. Even something as generic as "Orcs and Dwarves" could become a set if there's that much interest for it. And that's what I need- to know what people want from Astounding Minis, so I can provide top-notch paper miniatures sure to get use on your gaming table.

So browse the Perks, find the one that's right for you, and spread the word. Together we can make it happen.

EDIT: We're funded! And as we all know, that means...

STREEETCH GOALS

I'll be setting up a fun little graphic for these once the new computer arrives. But for now, here's a simple list:

$1,000: EVERY Perk will receive, in addition to the goodies they already get, a FREE PDF of the first Astounding Minis set- estimated release date February 2013.

$1,500: PERSONALLY SIGNED copies of the Minisplosion cover, mailed to your address, for EVERY Perk! Want me to write you a love letter? Or hate mail? Or draw a mustache with glasses? Just ask and it's yours on your professionally printed 8.5" x 11" cover copy.

$2,000: ???

$3,000: ???
story_txt:
Short Summary
Well, folks, it's been a long time coming, but now it looks like it's here: the WhoDrewThis Mega Minisplosion is upon us.
"What does that even mean?" you ask. "And who ARE you?" Alright, alright, hold your equines.
My name's Ashton Sperry, founder and contributor for Pathfinder Paper Minis, the paper miniatures line licensed by Paizo Publishing, creators of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. I also run a little DeviantART page under the alias WhoDrewThis that some folks may know me better for. As for the WhoDrewThis Mega Minisplosion? Well, that would be a compilation miniatures pack of a whole lotta art from my DeviantART page and unfinished home projects, converted into paper minis and arranged into one big miniature set. We're talking some 160+ minis- at least- and that's not even including the commissions available as Perks. This will be one big, big, BIG minis set, and it's only available here as part of this Indiegogo project.
So, I mentioned the commissions, yes? Each Perk above the first one will net you at least one commissioned mini of your choice. That's right: anything you want drawn and turned into a mini is yours. Your character and his or her buddies, their main villain, a mechanical turtle, an anthropomorphic ham sandwich- basically anything you want. Each additional person signing up for a Perk helps expand the set for everyone, so it's not a bad idea to get your friends in on the action.
In addition, at higher Perks, I'll start taking names for input regarding my long-awaited minis biz, Astounding Minis, designed for you and your fellow gamers to fit the odd niches in gaming we all love. Lovecraftian horror? I can do that. Post-apocalyptic wasteland? Yup. Victorian steampunk? Why but of course. Even something as generic as "Orcs and Dwarves" could become a set if there's that much interest for it. And that's what I need- to know what people want from Astounding Minis, so I can provide top-notch paper miniatures sure to get use on your gaming table.
So browse the Perks, find the one that's right for you, and spread the word. Together we can make it happen.
EDIT: We're funded! And as we all know, that means...
STREEETCH GOALS
I'll be setting up a fun little graphic for these once the new computer arrives. But for now, here's a simple list:
$1,000: EVERY Perk will receive, in addition to the goodies they already get, a FREE PDF of the first Astounding Minis set- estimated release date February 2013.
$1,500: PERSONALLY SIGNED copies of the Minisplosion cover, mailed to your address, for EVERY Perk! Want me to write you a love letter? Or hate mail? Or draw a mustache with glasses? Just ask and it's yours on your professionally printed 8.5" x 11" cover copy.
$2,000: ???
$3,000: ???

story:
D.W: the end of all hope, our indie game project

D.W is a RPG and shoot 'em up with rich story and gameplay

 

Update#1: More images on indiegogo and the progress:

  • The story: 100%
  • designing character: 40%
  • concept art: 50%
  • the gameplay: 90%
  • the interface: 60%
  • voice acting 20%
  • sound: 30%
  • music: 10%

we will upload the actual gameplay video soon and update more regularly.

The Story:

  • In 2047, The earth is invaded by the alien force. You must lead your team fight to save the world. It is the crazy war include mechs, battle ships, monsters, tanks, soldier and many creatures that you cant imagine. The story progresses across 17 missions and you can unlock new characters.

The gameplay:

The gameplay is great, as players will take on the roles of 1 or 3 characters depend on your mission.

  • Story mode: You can choose 1 or 3 heroes with different weapons, skills and abilities. defeat the alien forces, bosses. Unlock heroes (up to 10).
  • Arena mode: Choose your hero and join the death match(5vs5). (more than 30 heroes inlude aliens.
  • suvival mode: kill the enemy, suvive as long as you can.

About the game :

  • There are 30 heroes and more than 40 weapons
  • Each hero can carry from 3 to 4 weapons
  • More than 100 type of unit (police, soldier, monster, mech, tank, battleship...)
  • AI is smart ( the alien can hide, find the good positions, fall back .....)

Why we need your help?

we need to raise money in order to develop the project. We are working very hard.  If we get enough money we will be able to make D.W the way we always wanted it to be. It is not easy to make a good game when you dont have enough money.

What is money for?

  • painting
  • designing character
  • programming
  • concept art
  • voice acting
  • music
  • software

If we reach over the goal:

2500$

  • update the gameplay (the game will be crazier)
  • the hero can carry more weapons
  • add more heroes and weapons
  • more skills
  • more missions and arena maps
  • cutting down development time

Follow us on facebook to see more concept arts:

Link: http://www.facebook.com/DwTheEndOfAllHope   (update every3day)


The other ways you can help

  • Spread the word
  • Share our facebook link 
  • make concept art if you love the game

THANK YOU!!

PS : We dont own the song of our video

we will update the design of the T-shirt soon

story:
Concept:

Combat between 10-20 contestants is live streamed over the internet via cameras and head-mounted displays on each person. Anyone can watch and influence the arena via a website. Viewers can sponsor players or pay to use ultimate gamemaker abilities. 

The purpose of this campaign is to raise money and publicty for the creation of a "Hunger Games" style live-streamed battle royale. Viewers act as gamemakers via online actions and manipulate the real-world environment, complete with actual people in competition. 

The Game

10-20 players will fight to the last man standing in a live elimination tournament. Gameplay in early stages could be tested with paintball weapons, capture objectives, or other already established means. Hopefully this campaign will encourage innovation in hybrid gaming.

Players attempt to eliminate eachother until the last man standing. This player will recieve a prize.

  • Viewers online will have the option of sponsoring a player... i.e. "joining their district"
  • Viewers will wager gamemaker influence, a currency used to wield gamemaker abilities on the arena, when selecting a player. If your tribute wins, you will recieve bonus points.


The Show

Users will view the arena on an interactive website. The tournament could be monthly or annual to encourage a truly awesome arena to be designed. Users could swap between the main show video, indiviudal player feeds from head mounted displays, or arena cameras. 

Users could also access game stats, an arena map with real-time player locations, and a Gamemaker panel. Players could spend gamemaker influence access special abilities to use on the arena. 

During the games, at various points viewers will be prompted to make choices that will influence the real arena. The crowdsource element will make audience participation a revolutionary experience and have real-world environmental effects.

Examples:
Engage a trap
Set off an explotion
"Heal" a player
Affect the arena layout
Create a trap
Send player supplies

After the games a highlights video would be compiled and available for all.

Business Model

  • subscriptions: each game could be pay-pay-view for a small fee. Just like in "The Condemned"
  • advertising: this would generate a ton of internet publicity. ads could be sold on the show or website. A hunger games style event marketed  well could have millions of viewers.
  • gamemaker abilities: certain abilities could cost money to activate, all the way up to expensive explosions, weapons for your player, or effects.
  • sponsorship: of players or an entire game.
  • customization: wealthy enthusiasts could pay to have entire fantasies constructed for them.

A Gamer's Dream

There are millions of gamers, paintball fans, Hunger Games™ fans, etc. across the world. If every one of us were to donate $1 we could make this a reality and spur the development of a new experience. With the development of Google's Project Glass and other HMD's it's very possible to see this idea start soon. The goal was set to a million because what's important is publicity. Even if we don't raise a single dollar we want to show companies that there is an interest for this. This is really all for fun and creativity-- something everyone should strive for. 

In Pop Culture

The idea of video game concepts applied to real life isn't anything new, but technology is advancing to the point where I believe games like this can become a reality.

Hunger Games (book/movie): You should have seen this movie. Noob.
Death Race (movie): a video game like car race where inmates compete for their freedom- live streamed to the world.
Battle Royale (movie): School kids are sent to an island to fight to the last man standing. Everyone is given a backpack with random weapons and supplies.
The Condemned (movie): Prisoners are sent to an island for a fight-to-the-death battle. The entire event is live-streamed as a "reality-show" to the internet.

Endless Possibilities

This concept is only limited by our creativity. Everyone who donates will be kept in the loop on developments. Real life RTS games and more could expand. Imagine being the lord of a real-live medieval town whose populace consists of volunteers who agree to abide by game roles for housing/food/etc.?

 
**note I am in no way associated with or attempting to misrepresent myself as official Hunger Games IP

story:
We didn't reach our target which is a shame, but I would like to thank everyone who supported and backed us!

We will be contacting everyone regarding their Perks and Beta access nearer to release time (approx. July 2013).

Please 'like' our facebook page (if you haven't already done so) to keep up to date with development and release times.

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Montagues-Mount/4...

Many thanks again...

 

"One desolate landscape... one solitary fisherman... and an island hiding memories around every turn" - Montague's Mount.

Montague's Mount is a first person psychological rollercoaster ride through isolation, desolation and one man's tortured mind; all set against the bleakness of an isolated Irish island.

It was born out of a love of both video games and cinema. Long before I ever sat down to create my first video game (approximately 20 years ago), I could been seen waving a camera at just about anything. Over the years, certain movies have captured my imagination, namely; "One Flew Over the Cuckoos Nest"; Kubrick's "The Shinning"; "The Blair Witch Project"; and more recently, Scorsese's "Shutter Island". All these films have a common thread of isolation, desolation and touch upon some shocking issues.

Current trends within the gaming world have left the market awash with Horror'esque games; most of which revolve around 'Shock or Buckets of Blood' tactics to get their message across. My goal with Montague's Mount is to redefine the Horror genre, giving the gamer a combination of clever puzzles, a thought-provoking story that touches upon real issues (such as mental health), and stays true to my love of cinematic visuals.

As the game is set on an island off Ireland, we are going to embrace 'all things Irish' as much as we can, including the Irish language (Gaeilge). We believe Montague's Mount will be the first ever mainstream game to use the Irish language (don't worry, English subtitles/options will be available, as will other languages).

 

“It felt like this was never going to end. The world wasn't going to stop crashing down until there was nothing left of me but dust.” - Keary Taylor

The story is pretty much water tight. We know where I am going with the lead character and the environment. Creating a new back-story, which would hold up well against the location and the realities of mental illness wasn't easy and it has been a long, and at times soul searching, experience.

The island locations for the initial episode have been mapped out, with the initial prologue section being fully realised with the game engine; including all the puzzle elements being mapped out.

A Steam Greenlight submission has been made for Episode 1 and this is going extremely favourably.

Episode 1 is approximately 75% complete and I am hopeful, if this indiegogo campaign is successful, that a Christmas 2012 release is more than possible.

"For too long we have swept the problems of mental illness under the carpet... and hoped that they would go away" - Richard J. Codey

In a word, "Dedication". I have a real passion for Montague's Mount. For the last 12 months I have developed and worked single handedly on what you see, spending thousands of hours modelling, coding, designing and writing. Apart from a few models and the music from the video, everything has been made with my hands - and I have enjoyed every second of it (much to my wife's dismay - she says I am constantly in the office).

Having worked within the IT and games industry for 20 years I am no stranger to game development and personally have all the skillsets required to deliver this game. Up until now, having the ability and the passion to complete this, combined with a 'day job' to pay the bills, has been fantastic.

Unfortunately, life has changed. The economic decline which has hit Ireland has left me being made redundant and now my goals for Montague's Mount far exceed my resources.

That is why I am asking for your help to help me complete Montague's Mount. To give me the necessary resources to finish it and to finish it to the highest level possible.

First and foremost by pledging to this campaign. Your contributions are what will keep this project afloat. Without your help this project cannot go much further and I fear Montague's Mount will founder... which would be a tragedy. Something full of so much passion, and time spent upon it, cannot be allowed to go this way.

"This is all so familiar; I have been this way before. It was Peter and Aine who brought me this way. If only this unrelenting rain would give in, I could say for sure. Day after day, this perpetual dampness, crawling all over me, saturating everything on this island" - Montague's Mount

Contributions Level 1 - $15,000

If we can get to a contributions level of $15,000 that would be amazing. This amount would give me the necessary resource to complete Montague's Mount. It would allow for a simultaneous release on PC, Mac and Linux devices. As you can see from what has been accomplished so far, Montague's Mount will end up being a fantastic final game and with this level of support, allow me to fulfill this.

Contributions Level 2 - $20,000

If, with your help, we can get to Level 2 that would be truly fantastic. The additional contributions would allow me to try far more advanced things with Montague’s Mount. It would allow for some outsourcing of asset creation, which in turn would allow me additional time to polish the product to a much higher level. New shaders could be written to replace the current water system and additional eye candy could be added. When I started this project, one of my goals was to make the most realistic and 'living' environment of any game before made. With this level of support, this goal could be realised.

Contributions Level 3 - $25,000

If, we could get to Level 3, well that would be amazing! This amount would allow for all the I's to be dotted and the T's to be crossed.

It would allow us to cement a mobile device release and look at other platforms. It allow for mobile devices to be purchased to test Montague’s Mount for deployment onto these platforms. With all the detail currently in the Montague’s Mount environment, getting it to run on a mobile device will not be easy. Quite a bit of reworking will be needed to get it running smoothly. That said, one of my goals is to see this running on a tablet. The iPad, for instance, would make a perfect partner for Montague’s Mount.

It will allow us to start researching new input devices, such as the Oculus Rift VR headset and new platforms such as OUYA.

Contributions Level 4 - $30,000+

This is the ideal solution, which would let me add all the bells and whistles to the project, and make Montague’s Mount the game is really should be. It would allow for additional help. More time to be spent polishing everything to the highest level possible. It will allow for additional time allocated for marketing and promotion.

It will also give us the time and resources to implement the Oculus Rift VR headset into Montague's Mount. The Oculus Rift Virtual Reality headset is something that I must get implemented into Montague’s Mount. It is cutting edge technology and would add and additional level of realism and immersion that would be mind blowing.

It would make Montague's Mount become one of the first supporters of the Oculus Rift and be a huge selling factor for the project.

Lastly, I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for taking the time to read this campaign.

Like I said, I know money is tight; we all have bills to pay on a daily basis. I understand fully if contributing financially to this campaign is out of the question.

Could I ask that, whether you can afford to contribute or not, you tell as many people as you can about this project. If you are a Twitter or Facebook user, please spend a minute and post a few words about it and ask others to do the same.

Your help is vital and much appreciated.

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Montagues-Mount/445246645513488

http://twitter.com/montaguesmount

Many thanks once again.

Your help is vital and much appreciated.http://www.facebook.com/pages/Montagues-Mount/445246645513488http://twitter.com/montaguesmount
Many thanks once again.

story:
Lamplighter

It's exactly like it sounds, your support will grant you the opportunity to become part of our team. Not only will you get to see games before they come out, you will also get to test them and have a say in the development.

~Each Lamplighter is entitled to a future 5% discount on all LLG products! 

~Each and every backer at this level will be listed on our website as an early supporter (Lamplighter) and also in the Rules books of ALL of our games! 

~Every Lamplighter will have access to a printable version of a membership card, which will entitle you to different unique benifits in the future!

Some of the things Lamplighters can be involved with:

  1. Teachers: teaching people how to play our games at conventions and gaming events.
  2. Translators: translating our games into different languages.
  3. Tournament Coordinators: coordinating small tournaments. 
  4. Playtesters: playtest print-and-play versions of our games during development.
  5. Group Buy Coordinators: coordinate international group buys of of Kickstarter projects so we can keep shipping costs to a minimum worldwide.
  6. Proofreaders: review rules before our games go to print.

Designer 1

If you back at the designer 1 level we will look at your game design, and our development team will review it. As a minimum we will read the rules and write a review with a minimum of 500 characters. You are required to supply us with the rules and a written overview of the game.

If we feel your game is promising we will also make the rules available to our Play-Testers. We can't guarantee it will be published but you will get it in front of a large group of people, and give it a great chance!

The game will remain your personal property and nothing will be released without your permission.

If you have more than 1 game please pledge accordingly (minimum $10 per game), we will go through the first game from every backer before looking at additional games. 

The order of this process will be on a first backed, first served basis. This level also includes the Lamplighter level.

Designer 2

Designer 2 includes everything from the Designer 1 tier and as well:

We will make a playable prototype and play your game a minimum of 2 times.

If you have more than one game design you would like to submit please pledge accordingly (minimum $25 ea)

A unique opportunity!

This campaign is really a way for us to say thank you from the bottom of our hearts to the early supporters of Lamp Light Games. We plan on being around for a long time and you will have a very unique opportunity to be a real part of our adventure. 

We will have a private forum (already set up) for Lamplighters to discuss the games they are testing, and other neat benefits along the way. 

There will also be opportunity for Lamplighters to help out at trade shows and Con's, representing the Lamp Light Games community. 

We are excited to have you come along side us and be a part of the future of Lamp Light Games!

Why pay?

This is an opportunity to see games before they are released, have your name listed as a supporter, get a discount and also take part in the actual development process. We feel that this is more than worth a few dollars, and trust you do as well. 

Designers- Have you tried to submit your game to publishers only to be frustrated or ignored? This is your chance, at a very reasonable cost, to have your game looked at, played and potentially, published! 

What will we do with the money raised?

Any money raised in this campaign will go directly to the Lamplighters program. We are paying our prototype designer to make the print files ready to test. Funds will also go towards the website, mailing service and promotional materials related to the Lamplighters.

What type of games will LLG publish in the future?

We plan on developing a variety of games. Family, Euro, Card and even have plans for a Legacy game in the future. We also hope to be able to launch games by other designers, maybe even you!

story:
About me

Hi,

My name is Yossi Bar Erez. I'm an entrepreneur, programmer and designer. Back in 2006 I founded Terilyon software, which is a small software company. I've designed and programmed all kind of software titles, for business and personal use, which are used by companies and people around the world. Some of the business applications were even purchased and used by large corporations. My latest passion is making games, especially for tablets and phones. I'm trying to come up with original ideas, and make games that people would find unique, attractive and have great fun playing.

Thanks for watching,
Yossi





About Crush Shop

Crush shop is an action game. It is already playable on iPhone and iPad, but it is not finished and there is still work to do before it can be released. I plan to release it for Android too, and later PC and MAC.

The game requires quick response, coordination and skill. You own a demolition shop and work with the police to destroy stolen goods that they capture. You get paid for every item that you smash burn and destroy (a fee tag is attached to every item). You need to select the proper tools for every demolition job. As the degree of difficulty increases with every level, you also encounter dangerous items that you must find the way to handle. If you don’t... well, if you don’t, get

 

ready to spend a lot of your money (game money) on damage repairs. Be especially worry about the mighty alligator. You can earn a lot of money if you catch it, but how? This elusive animal will cost you an arm and a leg before you figure that out.

As you make progress and earn money, you add new items to your workshop. Those items will improve your workshop, making it more hospitable and better equipped.




When you start, your workshop is empty:


As you win levels, items are added to your shop:




What I Need

When I started making Crush Shop I thought that it would take 4 or 5 months. How wrong I was. It's more than a year now since I've started making this game, working full time developing it. It proved to be much more complicated and demanding than I anticipated. Although the game is already playable, there is still a way to go before it can be finished and released. Here is where you, the contributor, can make a difference by supporting the project, helping to bring it to the finish line. Your contribution will be used cautiously for very modest salaries, pay professionals that I need to hire and some for marketing. It will allow to complete the iPad/iPhone versions first, then the Android version, and lastly the PC and MAC versions.
I would greatly appreciate your contribution, and I really believe that you will like and enjoy the result.

Thanks, Yossi

story:
Dear potential contributor,

  I am very happy to have your attention. If you would not like to contribute to this project right now, I will understand it as this project has nothing to show currently in comparison with others.
  Nevertheless I found some courage to ask you for funding of my project... so let me tell you about it.
  It is not going to be AAA game, but fair and enjoyable indie game. (Well, in case, I would earn enough funds, it can be AAA game, but let's be realistic here. :-) )
Check the updates for additional information!

What is it about?

This game project is successor of original idea, which was making first person relaxation game taking place in middle-european rural area. 
Now, I am working on project, which has two game modes:
  • Story/horror mode
  • Free mode

Story mode is on the other hand for players, who want to experience something fearful. This is not another zombie, or survival game. This game should make you fear and uncomfortable. 

As a man with mental illness (or I should say illnesses) you are sent to your brother-in-law's shed near the pond to continue your treatment. Your problems are getting better after few years of therapy, so your psychiatrist gave you some directions, what to do in case of emergency, some medication and ordered you to relax there alone. But the doctor didn't know that the place holds secrets and memories, which your mind suppressed. It's up to you if you will take your medication or not. If you solve your problems somehow else. You are not going to fight as this is not FPS, but you are going to explore yourself and your limits. 

I am so sorry, that I cannot tell you more right now about story (same pays for some game mechanics), it would spoil the experience offered by game.But I can assure you, that it will make you think a bit differently and challenge your nerves. Game is not about fighting, but about making decisions, exploring how things works and exploring the dangerous world.

Free mode is for people who want only to relax, do just ordinary things and nothing more. Just to have opportunity to spend 30 minutes away from reality and don't get stressed. You can arrange things around your pond as you wish, go fishing, grill some meat, make camp fires, set furniture as you like and more. You will have possibility to take care about fish, feed them, see them grow. But mostly, you will do just ordinary, but relaxing things.
Good thing about free mode is game mechanics. For example - if you go fishing and catch a fish, you'll need to store it afterwards in fridge. Fridge has its own capacity and power consumption. So you need to provide power to it from some power generator, like photovoltaic panels or petrol generator. Petrol generator needs petrol for running, so you need to buy it (don't be afraid, the game will be microtransaction-free). 
All of those things will be configurable for the game, so you may be able to play in free mode without having to care about power, storage, etc and just enjoy and explore the environment.
I will reveal more from story and other information, like game mechanics, via updates. 
More information about game
The game will offer following languages as standard:
  • English
  • Czech
  • German
Other languages will be available depending on level of funding, if goal is met, then Spanish and French language will be available.
For the relaxing content: I will deploy application on game website, which enables owners of the game to vote for new game mechanic, asset or whatever you can imagine to be implemented in the game next. So the game will be evolving continually without any DLCs or anything else. Owners of the game will get 1 vote per month, more can be bought. 
For the story mode: In case, the game will be successful, there will be additional story created without any fee for it.
Game will be available with story mode and without it for half of its price.
Lifespan of development of the game and support is planned to be for two years.

What would I need?

If you would contribute, I would use that funds to:
  • get better graphical assets
  • get some of the scripts 
  • get Unity engine Pro non-perpetual licence
  • get sound assets
  • proof reading of english texts and translations to other languages
  • establishing game website
For graphical assets I would mix my contribution, existing assets and digital artist's work. For sound assets I am planning to get them in sound bank or record some of them by myself.
Development of code will be done completely by me.

When is it done?

If I raise funds, I will do my best to finish it in Winter 2015/2016 (meaning December 2015 to February 2016).
I will provide you with regular updates through game website.
There are NOT going to be any public alfa testing, or early access of story mode. For free mode it will depend on situation, but it is rather possible.

What are funding goals?

The final target of 11000USD is distributed by following.

At 3500USD workflow and visuals will be improved significantly. Further donations will be invested into sound, languages and even better visuals (3D artist, 3D prefabs, animations).

Is it going to be finished?

I understand your concerns. I am professional developer for 9 years in commercial sphere (Energy & Utilities), but I have been doing such side activities as learning different game engines, 3D modelling etc. for even longer time. 
This project has been born in October 2014 and should become my first contribution to gaming world. I have invested over 500EUR by myself so far (licences, gfx and sound assets) and I am planning to invest 2000EUR or more, depending on my work earnings and savings.
I will finish this project no matter what, but without funding it will take a lot more time and some aspects of the game won't be as rich as I imagine that it can be.
