story:
Early Access Pre-Alpha: Be the first to play CoreTechs Tactics when it goes live in early fall 2014. 

Digital Soundtrack: Receive a digital download (MP3, FLAC, and more) of the official CTT soundtrack by veteran maestro Mike O.K. Go and listen to his many excellent albums over on Bandcamp and help support him directly if you like what you hear.

All Season Zero Operators: Gain access to every Operator created during 'Season Zero' or until the beginning of 2015, whichever comes second.

Digital Art book: Get a behind-the-scenes glimpse at the world-building process for CoreTechs Tactics - from concept art up to the finished product. You can get a taste of our lead artist's work over at his art blog, Hue Two - The Art of Darren Bird.

Drop Boost (30%): Boost your in-game drop rate for one month. You can activate it right away or save it for the perfect time. (You also gain the +15% Drop Boost from the Enforcer Gear).


Playset of All Season Zero Cards: Gain a full playset of every program card created during 'Season Zero' or until the beginning of 2015, whichever comes second. 

Drop Boost (50%): Boost your in-game drop rate for one month. You can it activate right away or save it for the perfect time. (You also gain the +15% Drop Boost from the Enforcer Gear).

CoreTechs Tactics T-Shirt : Receive an awesome CoreTechs Tactics T-Shirt. Exact sizes TBD. We are still in the process of selecting a vendor, hunting for best 

Premium Operator Designer: We'll design a premium Operator avatar to your specifications. Your custom Operator will be fully animated, having unique animations for its various actions. 

Producer Credit: You become a producer for CoreTechs Tactics  and get an in-game credit. 

Add-ons

Many of our rewards are also available as add-ons. See the chart below for pricing.

International Shipping: For any T-Shirts being shipped outside Canada or US, please add $15 for international shipping. 


Risks and challenges

CoreTechs Tactics has been a project of passion for more than three years. While holding down day jobs, we’ve devoted endless evenings and weekends to realizing our vision. Failure is not an option.

CoreTechs Tactics will not be a set-and-forget title. It is a platform that will constantly evolve new content, game modes and avenues for gamer engagement. As part of the team, you can be part of CTT’s evolution and journey.

Our most costly endeavor will be porting our code to the new engine. While this will be an immense task, we believe it’s an integral step towards the goals we’ve laid out and have budgeted accordingly. Maintenance costs for the game itself will be low as server costs for a turn-based game are far less than with other formats.

We know the scope of work required to finish this project and we are prepared for it - our passion and excitement have never been stronger. We have spent too much time and devoted too much energy - nothing will get in the way of seeing this project through!
story_txt:
UPDATE 1 - May Catch-up \ Retrospective:  Kickstarter & OIGC 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CoreTechs Tactics is something you've never seen before: a collectible card game that will allow you to make your own cards. Construct a deck from a limitless collection of cards and wage war on a hex-grid battlefield. Capture strategic points to increase your resources or gain an offensive edge. What makes CoreTechs Tactics truly unique is this: every part of the game is open for community contribution. Want to make your own hero? You can! Maps? Sure! Host your own tournaments? You bet! 

We aim to have CoreTechs Tactics running cross-platform and on Steam by Fall 2014.







Check out our Community Card Cast on Twitch TV.


For the quick and dirty version of the CCC, check out the ~ 1 min long orientation video below.





Why CoreTechs Tactics?

Check out Mike 'O.K.' on SoundCloud or support him directly on Bandcamp.



All tiers under $300 receive the rewards from every previous tier. Early Access Pre-Alpha: Be the first to play CoreTechs Tactics when it goes live in early fall 2014. Digital Soundtrack: Receive a digital download (MP3, FLAC, and more) of the official CTT soundtrack by veteran maestro Mike O.K. Go and listen to his many excellent albums over on Bandcamp and help support him directly if you like what you hear.All Season Zero Operators: Gain access to every Operator created during 'Season Zero' or until the beginning of 2015, whichever comes second.Digital Art book: Get a behind-the-scenes glimpse at the world-building process for CoreTechs Tactics - from concept art up to the finished product. You can get a taste of our lead artist's work over at his art blog, Hue Two - The Art of Darren Bird.Drop Boost (30%): Boost your in-game drop rate for one month. You can activate it right away or save it for the perfect time. (You also gain the +15% Drop Boost from the Enforcer Gear).Playset of All Season Zero Cards: Gain a full playset of every program card created during 'Season Zero' or until the beginning of 2015, whichever comes second. Drop Boost (50%): Boost your in-game drop rate for one month. You can it activate right away or save it for the perfect time. (You also gain the +15% Drop Boost from the Enforcer Gear).CoreTechs Tactics T-Shirt : Receive an awesome CoreTechs Tactics T-Shirt. Exact sizes TBD. We are still in the process of selecting a vendor, hunting for best 
Personal CTT Portrait: Like our awesome CoreTechs Tactics team portraits? Get one for yourself with this exciting add-on! Our lead artist Darren will transform a photo of you into a Technocrat or Brethren soldier, eager to fight for humanity's survival. Perfect for forums and social media, or just to show off and make your friends jealous!Base Card Designer: We'll design a base program card to your game-mechanic and visual specifications. It can be either a daemon, a command, or a structure, for either faction. The card will have a single pose, similar to Hearthstone or MTG Online. Premium Card Designer: We'll design a premium program card to your game-mechanic and visual specifications. It can be either a daemon, a command, or a structure, for either faction. The card will be fully animated, having unique animations for its various actions. Premium Operator Designer: We'll design a premium Operator avatar to your specifications. Your custom Operator will be fully animated, having unique animations for its various actions. Producer Credit: You become a producer for CoreTechs Tactics  and get an in-game credit. Add-onsMany of our rewards are also available as add-ons. See the chart below for pricing.International Shipping: For any T-Shirts being shipped outside Canada or US, please add $15 for international shipping. Risks and challengesCoreTechs Tactics has been a project of passion for more than three years. While holding down day jobs, we’ve devoted endless evenings and weekends to realizing our vision. Failure is not an option.CoreTechs Tactics will not be a set-and-forget title. It is a platform that will constantly evolve new content, game modes and avenues for gamer engagement. As part of the team, you can be part of CTT’s evolution and journey.Our most costly endeavor will be porting our code to the new engine. While this will be an immense task, we believe it’s an integral step towards the goals we’ve laid out and have budgeted accordingly. Maintenance costs for the game itself will be low as server costs for a turn-based game are far less than with other formats.We know the scope of work required to finish this project and we are prepared for it - our passion and excitement have never been stronger. We have spent too much time and devoted too much energy - nothing will get in the way of seeing this project through!

story:
We are Inova Entertainment, a team of video game fans now developers. Our company is based in Geneva, Switzerland, and was created in 2013. Our first main goal is to create funny and quality games. Our second is to gather people and create a community of gamers playing altogether.

Since the company is young, the team consists of three main team members : Carlo (founder of Inova and computer engineer), Tuân (illustrator) and Sveta (illustrator and 3D modeler).

*  *  *

私達は「イノバ・エンターテイメント」と言い、ゲームの大ファンであり開発チームです。弊社は2013年にスイス、ジュネーヴ市に設立されました。私達の最初の目標は良質で面白いゲームを作る事です。次に、沢山の人々を集め、共にプレイをするゲーマーのコミュニティーを作る事です。

会社が立ち上がってからはまだ浅く、現段階ではイノバのメンバーは、設立者であり技術者のカルロ、イラストレーターのトワン、そしてイラストレーター・3Dモデラーのスベタの３人です。


Inova’s first creation is called « Grumpy Granny ». It’s a 3D throw game for Smartphones in which you play the role of an old lady, the Grumpy Granny, who’s disturbed by noise coming from the street below her apartment. To take revenge, she chooses to throw fruits and vegetables at people from her window! Your actions will deeply influence the game: interactive elements, intelligent behaviours of your targets, and many other surprises await! Another key feature of Grumpy Granny is that the game will constantly vary depending on the day and the hour: the characters will be different, allowing you to discover new actions and possibilities. Widen Grumpy Granny’s experience to the fullest by logging in to the game at different moments of the day and the week! To make this possible, we worked during two years on Grumpy Granny’s graphics and physics engine.

*  *  *

イノバ・エンターテイメント初の作品名は「グランピーグラニー」と言うスマートフォン用3Dゲームです。自分の住んでいるアパート周辺の騒音に悩まされているグランピーグラニーと言うおばあさんが、うるさい人達にフルーツや野菜を窓から投げつけるゲームです！あなたの行動によってゲームは大きく変わります。インターラクティブな要素や、ターゲット達の賢さなど様々な驚きが待っています！その他特長としては、時間と日によってキャラクターが変わり、様々な新しい動きや変化を発見する事ができます。それにより、グランピーグラニーの楽しみ方の可能性を広げる事ができます。これを可能にする為にグランピーグラニーのグラフィックやテクノロジーに約２年間注ぎ込みました。








The engine, besides ensuring you an optimal experience on Smartphones, will also enable you to be a part of the game. We developed a technique to model you and determine your behaviour in Grumpy Granny. If you want to see yourself or one of your friend featured in the game as one of the main character, it’s really easy: in sending us pictures, we can draw you and 3D model you, then include you in the game. You can literally experience Grumpy Granny from the inside!

For more information, please have a look at the “Rewards” section and visit www.BInAGame.com

*  *  *

こう言った素晴らしい機能の他に、あなたは更にグランピーグラニーに加わる事ができます。私達はあなたの容姿や行動などをモデルにしたキャラクターを作る技術を開発しました。もしあなたやあなたの友達をゲームのキャラクターとして登場させたいのならばとても簡単です。私達にあなたの写真を送って頂ければ、あなたのグラフィックを描き、3Dモデル化し、ゲームに加えます。グランピーグラニーと言うゲームを違う角度から楽しむ事ができます！

更なる詳細は、我々のホームページであるwww.BInAGame.comにある「Rewards」の所をご参照下さい。


The Game… and more!

There are 2 options for you guys: get the game 1 day before its official release, or become a Beta Player! If you do so, you’ll take part in the game development in joining Grumpy Granny’s community! Follow the evolution of the game in real time and share your thoughts and suggestions with us and other Beta Players!

あなたに２つのオプションをご用意致しました。一つ目は、ゲーム発売日よりも１日早く先にプレイをして頂けます。二つ目は我々のベータプレイヤーとしてゲームコミュニティーの一員になり、あなたの意見や考えを私達や他のベータプレイヤー達と共有し、ゲームの向上に関わる事ができます！


Digital original soundtrack, prints and artbook

Signed postcards and posters are also available! Perfect if your bedroom looks a bit glaucous!

You want to hear the music and see how we created the game? The OST and the artbook are a perfect completion to an in-depth immersion into Grumpy Granny’s world!

サイン付きのポストカードやポスターなどもご用意しています！

あなたのお部屋を更にお洒落にする事ができます！

グランピーグラニーのゲーム内の音楽や作成の過程が気になりますか？ゲームのサウンドトラックと絵画により、完璧なグランピーグラニーの世界観溢れるコレクションになります。


You in the game and even more!



Be a game character! Would you like to see you or one of your relatives in a cartoon version and modeled entirely in 3D? We can do it! We can also define the behaviour of your character in accordance with your wishes, that’s easy! Depending on the reward you’ll choose, your frequency of appearance will increase a lot. You can be a random character of Grumpy Granny or even a constant character; switch it between public and private; it’s up to you. And there’s something else if you choose to be in the game: you’ll receive a custom t-shirt with a printed cartoon version of you, plus a colored figure of you!

あなたはあなたやあなたの友達などをゲームのキャラクターとしてアニメ化し、3Dモデル化してみたくありませんか？私達ならそれが可能です！あなたの要望に沿ってあなたのキャラクターの行動を決める事も簡単です！あなたの選ぶ特典により、あなたのキャラクターの登場頻度を増やす事ができ、ゲーム内にランダム又は頻繁に登場するキャラクターかも選ぶ事もできます。そしてその他にも更なる特典があります！あなたのキャラクターが描かれたオリジナルＴシャツやフィギュアをプレゼントしています。


Your shop in the game !

You own a shop and would like some exposure ? Why don’t you ask us to draw the inside of your café, restaurant, library or whatever, then include it in the game ? Just like the characters, we can do it ! We can also add the signboard of your shop in the game and will print an exclusive t-shirt with its design just for you ! Please keep in mind we can’t exactly reproduce the inside of your shop due to technical limitations.

あなたのお店をゲーム内で宣伝しませんか？あなたのカフェやレストラン、お店など何でもゲームに加える事ができます。キャラクター作成同様に簡単にできます！お店の看板などもゲームに登場させ、そのデザインのＴシャツを作る事もできます！ただし、技術上の制限によりあなたのお店を完璧には再現できない事をご了承下さい。


Thanks again for checking our crowdfunding page, we hope to see you soon among Grumpy Granny's players !!!!

INOVA ENTERTAINMENT

story:
Introducción:

Hola, soy Tanausú Gómez y os presento mi tributo a esa gran consola que es GameBoy con Space Cadet. Uniendo así mis dos grandes pasiones, el espacio y la GameBoy.

Esta campaña se ha creado para poder financiar el juego y poderlo portar a otras plataformas como Linux, Tizen, Android/Ouya e iOS/MacOS y poder ponerlo así a la venta en sus diferentes tiendas online como Desura, Google Play, App Store, etc.

Sobre Space Cadet:

El proyecto está en fase temprana de desarrollo y es, como he dicho antes, un juego que ofrece un gran reto en intensos niveles. Space Cadet es juego arcade frenético que hará las delicias de los jugadores más hardcore.

El por qué de este proyecto es que necesito conseguir los fondos mínimos para obtener las licencias necesarias para poder portar el juego a diversas plataformas.

Podréis encontrar más información sobre el juego y una versión descargable de prueba en su página de IndieDB.



Si consiguiese la financiación pedida o más, lo invertiría todo en el juego, en la creación de nuevos niveles o la adquisición de material para el juego, músicas, sprites o cualquier otra cosa que pueda necesitar ser mejorada.

Podéis elegir vuestra recompensa favorita de las varias que hay, en las que podréis, desde adquirir desde ya una copia digital del juego hasta participar en su creación.

Si no consiguiese la totalidad de la financiación, usaría lo recaudado para adquirir (Si fuese suficiente) las licencias en este orden:

  • Linux
  • Android
  • iOS/MacOS
Tu apoyo es totalmente necesario para poder llevar este, mi primer proyecto, a buen puerto. Todos los que alguna vez disfrutamos de los 8 bits tenemos una serie de recuerdos memorables que en Space Cadet intento que podamos revivir.

Difúndeme:

Si no puedes colaborar económicamente no significa que no puedas hacerlo de otras maneras, usa las herramientas para compartir la campaña por los foros o las redes sociales por las que te muevas. ¡Quizás algún amigo de un amigo esté interesado! :-)

Muchísimas gracias por detenerte aquí y al menos, leer el proyecto, espero que sea de tu agrado :D

Tanausú Gómez García.

story:
Created through discussions with serial entrepreneurs, angel investors and VCs, this deck of cards features 70 essential questions founders should be able to answer about their company.

Through our startup bootcamps we help people extrapolate ideas into ventures and designed FounderDeck as an educational aid.  We think anyone can use FounderDeck to plan a new venture and hone their entrepreneurial skills post-launch and are excited to offer it to you through this campaign. 

Meeting our target will help us place a custom order for high quality decks to be manufactured by our production partner and contributions to our campaign let you pre-order 1 or multiple FounderDecks - for yourself, portfolio, friends or family.

Help Us Get FounderDeck Into Your Hands :)

Some more background on this campaign:

  • We need to raise at least $3,500 to place a large enough order with our production partner to print high quality cards and ship them in custom packaging.
  • The more FounderDeck games you order the more you save, and the more you can earn - perks include discounted games plus investor meetings with top professional Canadian Venture Capitalists.
  • After lots of prototyping we've got a great looking deck and box, so even if we don't make our target we can ship orders. But, if we do make our campaign target the size of the order will allow us to ship even higher quality cards in deluxe custom packaging.


How FounderDeck Helps Entrepreneurs

We've put prototypes of the game into the hands of startup founders and seen that:

  • Most entrepreneurs have only asked themselves ~20% of the questions in the game, and immediately see value in figuring how they'd answer the rest.
  • Investors playing with our prototype are excited to give it to their portfolio companies and use it to continually assess company vision etc...
  • The game helps founders relate details of their entrepreneurial journey to friends and family in a fun way.
  • Founders playing the game with their staff/teams find that it helps everyone get on the same page - expressing common wants, needs and goals.
  • The deck is an essential study guide for anyone preparing for investor meetings - it contains the majority of questions professional investors ask founders, and helps them start questioning themselves in advance of being put on the spot when pitching.


Simple Ways to Play

Each deck has 70 cards and each card has 1 question printed on it.  Shuffle the deck and:

  • Ask yourself as many questions as you'd like... answering ad hoc or against a timer on your mobile phone.
  • Sit down with your co-founder or team-mate; each of you takes turns pulling a card and asking the other person a question, then answering themselves (a great way to get on the same page.)
  • Give it to your spouse/friend/family-member; you'll find you start learning how to explain your company in less formulaic ways.
  • Grab a drink + some friends & role-play - each of you can pretend to be someone else answering on behalf of their company (e.g. Play as Elon Musk representing Tesla or Jeff Bezos from Amazon); this is a fun way to play and helps people get used to breaking down business models on the spot.

Think FounderDeck Is Cool?

Whether you order a deck through contributing to this campaign or not we can use your help to:

  • Make some noise about the campaign - we'd love it if you could share the love on twitter, facebook, instagram etc and share this campaign page (there are sharing links on this page.)
  • Email a link to the campaign to anyone you know who is an entrepreneur or who is considering starting a company.
  • Let people know about WeTeachStartup (http://weteachstartup.com) - our education series holds bootcamps to prepare entrepreneurs to launch startups.  We're based in Toronto but hold events all over the place.

story:
20YearsOfPlay


Welcome to 20YearsOfPlay! 

"We are asking € 500 for the construction of the 20YearsOfPlay website project, perks limtied to 4000! and 50% of  funders will recieve a prize/reward"

By participating in this @20YearsOfPlay project with € 5 you will have:

  • Contribution for the construction of the website more informed in Italy to celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the PlayStation (open to all, with free registration) will cover all the detailed information related to the history of PlayStation and its accessories from 1994 to today, the site will have a dedicated forum for users, a chat for only registered users (all free and open to the public) with a least 4TB server for downloading/uploading files then used for photo galleries, press kits in digital format and more, all in the most professional and dedicated to 20YearsOfPlay

  • Your name (Ex: Daniel F.) or the ID of the PlayStation Network (Ex: NetYaroze_PAL) will appear in the site once designed and built for supporting the project of @20YearsOfPlay and will participate at the 20YearsOfPlay contest, for more details, list of prizes, please visit 20YearsOfPlay facebook page! 
Note: If need support or have questions, please contact us at: https://sites.google.com/site/20yearsofplay

Thanks!

story:
*Indiegogo pitch video

 

Update #22

>> Archeblade Update Preview

 

Update #21

>> Comming up Next, New map "The Bridge"



Gallery - Ridika combo video updated!





 Users control one of several characters, each with strong personalities based on the acclaimed Korean fantasy novel 'Archeblade'. Archeblade recaptures the highlights of classic fighting games such as Street Fighter, Tekken and MOBA genre games while incorporating a plethora of modern gameplay action!

More than your typical fighting game, Archeblade dares gamers to take the plunge and revisit the world of third-person fighting games. Delivering vivid graphics and action packed gameplay, Archeblade's compelling and dynamic package is sure to please all potential thrill-seekers! 

 


      >> Archeblade Steam store page

      >> Early Access Basic Pack (DLC)

      >> Early Access Premium Pack (DLC)

      >> Search ‘Archeblade’ on Steam

      >> Search ‘Archeblade’ on Youtube







 Users can choose one of several characters, each with strong and unique personalities. Characters use their own  distinctive style of weapons and skills, allowing a wide range of  choices and identities for gamers to choose from. A total 12  characters are available right now, and continuous improvements  and updates will be rolled out.

    Archeblade supports up to 7 VS 7 battles, and cooperative gameplay, matching  your friends against other opponents.

 

 Archeblade utilizes a fighting-game style combo system, using a configuration of 9 keyboard buttons (w, a, s, d, e, f, shift, alt, and space), along with two mouse buttons. Users can make their own moves and combos by combining these buttons and developing their own unique skills! Try to make as many combos as you can and perfect your special moves!

 

 

The user engages opponents in several arenas with different objectives.

Choose your arena as a game mode: team deathmatch, capture the pylon, free-for-all, and more! Additional new maps are coming!


 Archeblade is based on the fantasy novel ‘Archeblade’ written by Junghoon Hong. Hong's extraordinary and mysterious world is brought to life by Codebrush Games, capturing all the depth and themes of the original novel!



 

  


 Users can take advantages of Steam features such as digital distribution, achievement, community features, automated game updates, in-game voice, and chat functionality.


 

 

  


Archeblade is free to play! All you need is a steam ID. Don’t hesitate to invite your friends over to battle. More friends, more fun!

 

  

 

  



The game has been serviced on Steam since March 29, 2013 as an early access game.  

So far, we have learnt many things. Good thing was there are many players who love this type of game. Bad thing was that our business model in Archeblade is too humble.

We hoped that Archeblade would be a ‘non pay to win’ game. And we thought we could get enough money for a final version of the game with selling just characters and skins like League of Legend does.

But we are wrong.

Only 1.5% of the players have purchased for those ‘non pay to win’ features.

And now? we are facing a critical issue. Publishers and investors are not interested in such a 'kind' free to play business model.

However, we strongly believe that Archeblade will be a great game once its completed. The total download of the game hits 500,000. and currently, we are ranked 91th biggest steam official group out of 8963 groups. Archeblade indeed has a potential. We are just one step away from the completion of the game.  

We need your support to maintain this game as a free to play game.

 


  


          

       


 


With your generous support, we will be able to implement these sweet features :)


 













 

 


 

We are ‘Codebrush Games’.

Codebrush Games is an independent game studio located in Korea which consists of 13 developers. Most of us have experience in developing games using Unreal Engine at NCsoft. Our debut title ‘Archeblade’ is also made out of Unreal Engine 3 which gives us a big benefit both in performance and quality. It has been almost 3 years since we're working on the project Archeblade.

 # Staff #



     A.   Nothing, Archeblade is free to play.

     A.  13 at the moment. There will be a lot more in the future.


     A.  There are 7 maps available right now. There will be a lot more in the future.


     A.  Every week 7 characters will be available for free for everyone, that's over half of              the characters!

These characters change every week so you have a chance to play all characters.
You will have to buy characters in order to be able to play them at any time.


     A.  There is a guide on how to make a server here:  

     http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=134749594


     A.  Not yet, but it is planned to be added soon.

 

     A. At the moment there are 30 ranks available, a list can be found here
     http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=135951365

     A rank indicates the experience of a player. The game is skill based so a rank will not      give you any stats whatsoever.


     A. You can filter servers by checking the filter buttons located under the server list in-game.


     A.  You can try to find the answer to your question here:
     http://steamcommunity.com/app/207230/discussions/0/864975632502648412/

     If that doesn't solve your problem you can make a thread on the forums located here:
     http://steamcommunity.com/app/207230/discussions/0/

     Or send an email to support@codebrush.net


     A.  For questions concerning payment you have to send an email to 

     billing@codebrush.net


     A.  You can post suggestions in the desired forum here: 

      http://steamcommunity.com/app/207230/discussions/2/


     A.   You can post bugs in the desired forum here:

     http://steamcommunity.com/app/207230/discussions/1/




If you have any question, feel free to contact us via:

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/codebrush

Email: support@codebrush.net, Jay.kwon@codebrush.net

Steam community:http://steamcommunity.com/app/207230

 

# # #

Archeblade is still in development, and there's a lot more to implement. We know the fact that there is a gap between making a game with and without feedback from actual players. Archeblade will evolve as you play it, as you give feedback, as we update and add content. See how your support and feedback reflects the game.

Thank you for taking your time to check our project.

See ya'll in the game!

Codebrush Games

# # #

story:
The skies turned red with sin.  The world writhed in the poison man had created.  Now we must part; we must move forward, and leave everything behind.  We must restart and rebuild; until fate turns her back to us again.

- Salvaged Diary Entry

In 2019, the humanity collapsed under its own influence.  The Red Sky Phenomenon plagued the world, saturating the once blue skies into a blood red color.  300 brilliant scientists from around the world were gathered to combat the phenomenon; they were called Project Domini.  The Vershina, 7 of the smartest scientists, led the project with steadfast determination.  After two years of research, they came up with a solution; a large membrane dome was created as a last stand for mankind.  Survivors from around the world were evacuated into the Haven, and society was recreated.  Humans were given a second chance.

The Vershina took the lead and forged a path for mankind.  Rebuilding society under their overwatch, the 7 Scientists ruled over their own cities; each built with their own, unique vision.  Each scientist took passion in their own cities, and proudly built it to their personalities.  The cities took on distinctive characteristics; one city turned out to become a center of the finest cuisines while another is built on the most advanced technology around.  With the ever-expanding diversity, things were looking bright for the human race.  A new age of innovation and progress was at hand.

Many years later, the world is in chaos once more.  Conflicting visions and petty rivalries split the seven scientists, each confining themselves to their own cities.  The people who once praised the seven scientists as Gods begin to lose faith.  Uproars and revolutions become more common as people became disgruntled with the leaders.  Eventually, the people snapped, and called for change.  The Haven was divided between those that supported the Vershina and those who opposed them.  War broke out and englufed the Haven in blood and fire.  The only survivng member of the original Vershina was a man named James, and he was left with the responsibility of ruling the Haven with 6 new leaders who do not understand the magnitude of things that were lost so many years ago.  While the world had somewhat settled down, the scars of war still remained.

And it only took one man, one girl, and one secret to set the conflict into motion once more.

 Welcome to Project Domini.

"It looks like we are back where we started. I guess we really haven't learnt anything."

- Unknown Voice Log 

Who are we?

We are Project Domini, a group of students from Japan who are attempting to create a story based strategy game.  While being a hobbyist project, we are ambitious and motivated to deliver the best possible game in all respects.  Gameplay, music, art, and story; everything is important in making a coherent and exciting experience. 

While this is the first game we've ever worked on, we have some credentials to back us up.  We have all taken computer classes at school, so we understand fundamental programming.  Our programmer is extremely skilled and has been programming ever since he was born (seriously).  The Director is a gamer who enjoys stories with good stories and lore and even writes his own lore and stories once in a while.  Our two story writers are talented to say the least; one of them is an avid journalist who strives to capture every aspect of our school with captive vocabulary.  Although this does sound like much (it probably isn't), we are still young, and we will have more opportunities to grow and become more proficient in game developping.  Our goal is to grow with this game.

What is this game about?

This game is a strategy game with a deep story.  Your actions and decisions will forge the story: you will be the storyteller.  By conquering your enemies, more secrets will be uncovered, and the story will progress, throwing you deeper into the conspiracy, until there's no way out.  Choose how you will carry out your conquest: will you crush all that stand before you, will you negotiate peacefully, or will you manipulate your enemies to fall into submission?  Take advantage of your enemies and their weaknesses and use their psychological flaws against them.

The gameplay will be based on two fundamental sections: strategy and combat.  The strategy section will play like..well...a strategy game.  Here you will be able to manage your army, decide who you want to conquer and plan our your next moves.  There will also be a complex reputation system in game.  You will either be feared, respected, or neutral with other cities, and depending on the degree of your reputaion, their reaction to you will be different.  For example, cities who repspect you are more likely to trade with you while cities that fear you will act hostile or will surrender to you.

The combat section brings a faster pace to the game.  Though this isn't set in stone, we are planning to go for a lightning fast combat system that requires quick thinking and long term strategizing.  Now that's kind of vague.  So allow me to explain.  The game will be like an encounter system.  If your troops run into enemy units, or if you declare war on other cities, you will be moved into 'combat mode'.  This will be composed of a grid style battlefield of varying size and shape.  In each grid, you will be able to place a unit.  The combat is divided into two stages: formation and combat.  During the formation stage, you will place your units on the battlefield in your desired formation.  Units include lightweight shotgunners, all around riflemen, long range snipers, attack helicopters, and more.  Each unit will have a unique range, cooldown between attacks, and other attributes.  You can also have formations that boost your overall power.  In the combat phase, everything moves into motion.  With lightning quick reflexes, select units and target your enemies.  Eliminate your foes by making full use of your formation and your cooldowns.  Be warned; lightining fast reflexes are required.

 

Why do we need funding?

To ensure that our game is the best quality it can be, we decided to hire two talented artists to help us out with the project.  While they have so many other opportunities, they decided to work with us.  So we want to pay the artists as much as they can for their hard work.  $1000 and any extra funds will go to the artists, while $500 dollars will go to paying for different programs and maybe some snacks for us:) 

All jokes aside, let us explain the math.  Our rough estimate for the number of art pieces for this game is around 50~60.  Since we plan to pay $15 for each art piece, the total will amount to around $1000.  Of course we would love to pay more because honestly, their art pieces are spectacular.  So, most of the extra funds (anything left over after we subtract what we need) will go to the artists.  This means that all funds above $1500 will go to the artists, no questions asked.  

For people who like the ideas but cannot fund this project, we understand.  So what can you do?  The question is, what can't you do? (besides funding)  You can share this with your friends, post it on your facebook, twitter, reddit, anything.  Spread the word; thats the only way we can get this idea out to everyone.  Give us some input. Tell us what you like, what you don't like, what you think will work and what you think will not.  Hit us an email telling us you like our project; the moral confidence boost that will give us is HUGE.  Give us your ideas, tell us what you want to see in the game.  Anything is appreciated.


"...for silence breeds insolence."

 - Pride

The Game World

Backstory

The world was thrown into chaos with the arrival of the Red Sky Phenomenon in 2015 A.D. This deadly disease took the lives of 4/5 of humanity’s entire population in a matter of several years, and mankind was on the verge of death as a species.

Agonized and desperate, mankind came to their one hope; their last resort- to gather the top scientists all over the world into the city of Moscow, and develop a safe haven for the dying mankind to survive. The team of three hundred, led by the 8 most prominent, developed a project into building an enormous dome- the size of a country- to shelter what remained of mankind. This project- titled “Domini”- would begin three years after the outbreak of the Red Sky, and end another three years later- in 2021. Mankind was finally safe, and was able to escape the dread of the outer world by taking refuge in the dome. But this safety -built on the corpses of the many rejected from the dome- was not long-lived.

In a matter of 10 years after the construction of the dome, one of the eight leading scientists was revealed to have planted a bug inside of the dome for an unknown reason. Shortly after this, the anger of the civilians would explode, and a civil war would take place between the scientists who planted the bug and the others supported by the enraged civilians. This “war” was ended in a matter of no time- the culprit of sabotage had hardly any supporters, and was executed in the face of thousands of furious eyes. Time would pass by, and the newly appointed seven would establish a system consisting of seven city-states, each led by the seven leading scientists and named after “their sins” to not forget the war- Pride, Envy, Wrath, Lust, Sloth, Greed, and Gluttony.

By 2051, the human civilization was established with the seven cities and Pride, the absolute leader, watching over the surviving people. But each city had become twisted in its own way, and the people adapting to such corruption- ironically enough, people would not change even after being on the verge of extinction. Then one decisive day, the nightmare that people had forgotten to fear would return to haunt mankind. The Red Sky was gradually, but steadily developing in the dome, and the countdown to the true end of humanity would begin.
 
 

Characters 

Tony Dovorzark


Tony Dovorzark is a 26 year old scientist living in the ouskirts of the Haven.  Demonstrating his intelligence from a young age, Tony graduated from Magna Aliqua, the highest level of education in the Haven at the early age of 14 (most finish around the age of 22).  While his past is shrouded in mystery, he shows no interest in it, claiming that he's only interested in what is ahead of him.  He has a knack for strategy, and can look at the big picture.  He is usually composed and very calm, but can become extremely passionate.  He also has a tendency of being cold even though he means no harm.

Ellie

 

 

Ellie is a girl around her 20s who suddenly appears in front of Tony, claiming she has 'important information'.  Not much is known about Ellie; just that she has information  on Tony and the condition of the Haven.  She is seemingly cheerful and lighthearted, and extremely easy-going.

James 

 

James is a man in his 60s, and the only surviving member of the original Vershina.  After the Great Revolution, he was left with the responsibility of rebuilding society.  James holds a deep love towards nature and Earth, and hoped that the Haven will help us learn a lesson.  When he finds out that this was not the case, he decides that he must go through extreme measures to protect this Earth from the wrath of man.  James is extremely serious and stubborn once he formulates an opinion.  His sense of responsibility and despair towards the human race caused him to go insane, a little by little.

Charlie

 

Charlie is a man in his 50s and is an arms dealer.  He provides Tony with weapons for his army.  When asked why he was helping, he simply stated that what Tony was trying to do was "interesting".  Charlie is extremely lazy and does not seem to care about anything.  While he seems like a simple man, many mysteries surround his existence.
story_txt:
The skies turned red with sin.  The world writhed in the poison man had created.  Now we must part; we must move forward, and leave everything behind.  We must restart and rebuild; until fate turns her back to us again.
- Salvaged Diary Entry
In 2019, the humanity collapsed under its own influence.  The Red Sky Phenomenon plagued the world, saturating the once blue skies into a blood red color.  300 brilliant scientists from around the world were gathered to combat the phenomenon; they were called Project Domini.  The Vershina, 7 of the smartest scientists, led the project with steadfast determination.  After two years of research, they came up with a solution; a large membrane dome was created as a last stand for mankind.  Survivors from around the world were evacuated into the Haven, and society was recreated.  Humans were given a second chance.
The Vershina took the lead and forged a path for mankind.  Rebuilding society under their overwatch, the 7 Scientists ruled over their own cities; each built with their own, unique vision.  Each scientist took passion in their own cities, and proudly built it to their personalities.  The cities took on distinctive characteristics; one city turned out to become a center of the finest cuisines while another is built on the most advanced technology around.  With the ever-expanding diversity, things were looking bright for the human race.  A new age of innovation and progress was at hand.
Many years later, the world is in chaos once more.  Conflicting visions and petty rivalries split the seven scientists, each confining themselves to their own cities.  The people who once praised the seven scientists as Gods begin to lose faith.  Uproars and revolutions become more common as people became disgruntled with the leaders.  Eventually, the people snapped, and called for change.  The Haven was divided between those that supported the Vershina and those who opposed them.  War broke out and englufed the Haven in blood and fire.  The only survivng member of the original Vershina was a man named James, and he was left with the responsibility of ruling the Haven with 6 new leaders who do not understand the magnitude of things that were lost so many years ago.  While the world had somewhat settled down, the scars of war still remained.
And it only took one man, one girl, and one secret to set the conflict into motion once more.
 Welcome to Project Domini.
"It looks like we are back where we started. I guess we really haven't learnt anything."
- Unknown Voice Log 

Who are we?
We are Project Domini, a group of students from Japan who are attempting to create a story based strategy game.  While being a hobbyist project, we are ambitious and motivated to deliver the best possible game in all respects.  Gameplay, music, art, and story; everything is important in making a coherent and exciting experience. 
While this is the first game we've ever worked on, we have some credentials to back us up.  We have all taken computer classes at school, so we understand fundamental programming.  Our programmer is extremely skilled and has been programming ever since he was born (seriously).  The Director is a gamer who enjoys stories with good stories and lore and even writes his own lore and stories once in a while.  Our two story writers are talented to say the least; one of them is an avid journalist who strives to capture every aspect of our school with captive vocabulary.  Although this does sound like much (it probably isn't), we are still young, and we will have more opportunities to grow and become more proficient in game developping.  Our goal is to grow with this game.

What is this game about?
This game is a strategy game with a deep story.  Your actions and decisions will forge the story: you will be the storyteller.  By conquering your enemies, more secrets will be uncovered, and the story will progress, throwing you deeper into the conspiracy, until there's no way out.  Choose how you will carry out your conquest: will you crush all that stand before you, will you negotiate peacefully, or will you manipulate your enemies to fall into submission?  Take advantage of your enemies and their weaknesses and use their psychological flaws against them.
The gameplay will be based on two fundamental sections: strategy and combat.  The strategy section will play like..well...a strategy game.  Here you will be able to manage your army, decide who you want to conquer and plan our your next moves.  There will also be a complex reputation system in game.  You will either be feared, respected, or neutral with other cities, and depending on the degree of your reputaion, their reaction to you will be different.  For example, cities who repspect you are more likely to trade with you while cities that fear you will act hostile or will surrender to you.
The combat section brings a faster pace to the game.  Though this isn't set in stone, we are planning to go for a lightning fast combat system that requires quick thinking and long term strategizing.  Now that's kind of vague.  So allow me to explain.  The game will be like an encounter system.  If your troops run into enemy units, or if you declare war on other cities, you will be moved into 'combat mode'.  This will be composed of a grid style battlefield of varying size and shape.  In each grid, you will be able to place a unit.  The combat is divided into two stages: formation and combat.  During the formation stage, you will place your units on the battlefield in your desired formation.  Units include lightweight shotgunners, all around riflemen, long range snipers, attack helicopters, and more.  Each unit will have a unique range, cooldown between attacks, and other attributes.  You can also have formations that boost your overall power.  In the combat phase, everything moves into motion.  With lightning quick reflexes, select units and target your enemies.  Eliminate your foes by making full use of your formation and your cooldowns.  Be warned; lightining fast reflexes are required.
 

Why do we need funding?
To ensure that our game is the best quality it can be, we decided to hire two talented artists to help us out with the project.  While they have so many other opportunities, they decided to work with us.  So we want to pay the artists as much as they can for their hard work.  $1000 and any extra funds will go to the artists, while $500 dollars will go to paying for different programs and maybe some snacks for us:) 
All jokes aside, let us explain the math.  Our rough estimate for the number of art pieces for this game is around 50~60.  Since we plan to pay $15 for each art piece, the total will amount to around $1000.  Of course we would love to pay more because honestly, their art pieces are spectacular.  So, most of the extra funds (anything left over after we subtract what we need) will go to the artists.  This means that all funds above $1500 will go to the artists, no questions asked.  
For people who like the ideas but cannot fund this project, we understand.  So what can you do?  The question is, what can't you do? (besides funding)  You can share this with your friends, post it on your facebook, twitter, reddit, anything.  Spread the word; thats the only way we can get this idea out to everyone.  Give us some input. Tell us what you like, what you don't like, what you think will work and what you think will not.  Hit us an email telling us you like our project; the moral confidence boost that will give us is HUGE.  Give us your ideas, tell us what you want to see in the game.  Anything is appreciated.
"...for silence breeds insolence."
 - Pride

The Game World
Backstory
The world was thrown into chaos with the arrival of the Red Sky Phenomenon in 2015 A.D. This deadly disease took the lives of 4/5 of humanity’s entire population in a matter of several years, and mankind was on the verge of death as a species.Agonized and desperate, mankind came to their one hope; their last resort- to gather the top scientists all over the world into the city of Moscow, and develop a safe haven for the dying mankind to survive. The team of three hundred, led by the 8 most prominent, developed a project into building an enormous dome- the size of a country- to shelter what remained of mankind. This project- titled “Domini”- would begin three years after the outbreak of the Red Sky, and end another three years later- in 2021. Mankind was finally safe, and was able to escape the dread of the outer world by taking refuge in the dome. But this safety -built on the corpses of the many rejected from the dome- was not long-lived.In a matter of 10 years after the construction of the dome, one of the eight leading scientists was revealed to have planted a bug inside of the dome for an unknown reason. Shortly after this, the anger of the civilians would explode, and a civil war would take place between the scientists who planted the bug and the others supported by the enraged civilians. This “war” was ended in a matter of no time- the culprit of sabotage had hardly any supporters, and was executed in the face of thousands of furious eyes. Time would pass by, and the newly appointed seven would establish a system consisting of seven city-states, each led by the seven leading scientists and named after “their sins” to not forget the war- Pride, Envy, Wrath, Lust, Sloth, Greed, and Gluttony.By 2051, the human civilization was established with the seven cities and Pride, the absolute leader, watching over the surviving people. But each city had become twisted in its own way, and the people adapting to such corruption- ironically enough, people would not change even after being on the verge of extinction. Then one decisive day, the nightmare that people had forgotten to fear would return to haunt mankind. The Red Sky was gradually, but steadily developing in the dome, and the countdown to the true end of humanity would begin.
 

 
Characters

Tony Dovorzark is a 26 year old scientist living in the ouskirts of the Haven.  Demonstrating his intelligence from a young age, Tony graduated from Magna Aliqua, the highest level of education in the Haven at the early age of 14 (most finish around the age of 22).  While his past is shrouded in mystery, he shows no interest in it, claiming that he's only interested in what is ahead of him.  He has a knack for strategy, and can look at the big picture.  He is usually composed and very calm, but can become extremely passionate.  He also has a tendency of being cold even though he means no harm.

Ellie is a girl around her 20s who suddenly appears in front of Tony, claiming she has 'important information'.  Not much is known about Ellie; just that she has information  on Tony and the condition of the Haven.  She is seemingly cheerful and lighthearted, and extremely easy-going.

James is a man in his 60s, and the only surviving member of the original Vershina.  After the Great Revolution, he was left with the responsibility of rebuilding society.  James holds a deep love towards nature and Earth, and hoped that the Haven will help us learn a lesson.  When he finds out that this was not the case, he decides that he must go through extreme measures to protect this Earth from the wrath of man.  James is extremely serious and stubborn once he formulates an opinion.  His sense of responsibility and despair towards the human race caused him to go insane, a little by little.

Dungeon Dwellers is now known as Dwelvers


Updates

As this campaing is no longer up to date you can follow the latest updates on Dwelvers official website: www.dwelvers.com



Support

It is still possible to support Dwelvers by pre-ordering the game from here: http://dwelvers.com/pre-order/

But I recommend you first try out the free downloadable version from the website to see if you like the game.



Links

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Dwelvers
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/Dwelvers
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/dwelvers
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/dwelvers/

story:
What is Ingeo?

Ingeo is a product that turns your Android phone into a real game console. 

Ingeo consists of a dock and a game controller. Drop your phone into the Ingeo Dock and it instantly connects to your TV. Grab the Ingeo Controller and press the Home button to launch Ingeo app for game selection. Select a game and start playing. When you are done just pick up your phone from the dock.

Game Console Already In Your Pocket

Did you know that the latest smartphones have computing power on par with your PC or XBOX360/PS3?
  • Smartphone vs PC
  • Smartphone vs XBOX 360/PS3 
  • Smartphone 4K video gaming 
  • Smartphone/PC/Console GPU GFLOPS 

With Ingeo you don’t need to buy an expensive hardware just for the console gaming experience. You already have all you need in your pocket. 

Playing shooters, simulators, and fighting games on a large TV screen is lots of fun. Ingeo lets you do just that by turning your smartphone into a real game console. 

One Platform Is All You Need 

Games for Ingeo are from the same Google Play store that you already use. There is no need to register or buy games in yet another app store.

Your new smartphone is already more powerful than all Android game consoles on the market. When upgrading your phone, you get to keep your games. And guess what? You also get a new and even more powerful gaming console! You can’t do that with traditional consoles. 

Make your new phone to do more things! Ingeo helps you to get the most our of your phone. 

No more messing around with multiple devices and user interfaces. One device, one interface, one app store. 

Games

There are hundreds of games already out there that you can play with Ingeo: first person shooters, racing, rpg, simulators and much more!

Some of supported Android games (there are many many more): 

Click here to see game list.

Your backing will also tell game developers that you like console games on smartphones. This gives them incentive to make even more games for you! 

Game Center App

We will provide a free Ingeo Game Center app. You can easily find and browse games supported by Ingeo and download them from Google Play. 


  • App starts when you dock your phone and all games supported by Ingeo are displayed.
  • Featured tab shows specially selected titles.
  • Games can be easily searched through categories.
  • A tab with top games played with Ingeo.

Design

We understand there are many phones with different sizes and micro USB layouts. Our design allows docking of virtually all smartphones that are available on the market. Ingeo Dock works with phone cases as long as Micro USB port is exposed. 

We also understand docking and undocking need to be made easy. Our unique design makes it as simple as dropping your phone into the dock and picking it up. 


The dock has an HDMI and a USB port. You can use the USB port to connect a keyboard and a mouse, access flash drives, or other peripherals. Simultaneous HDMI and USB usage supported on Samsung devices only. And yes, the dock is a charger as well. 

Starting from 2011, virtually all Android smartphones support either MHL or Slimport standard for HDMI output. Our dock supports all HDMI enabled phones, including standard MHL (5pin), Galaxy S3/S4 MHL (11pin), and Slimport interfaces using modular connectors. 

Our controller is designed in collaboration with David Hansson. It features a beautiful angular style, making it stand out from the pack. 

The controller has a standard set of buttons, force feedback motors, and  a built-in accelerometer. You will be able to control games by tilting the controller with games like Temple Run.

Ingeo Controller Key Features

  • Accelerometer
  • Force Feedback
  • Phone Fixture

Our controller also allows you to dock your phone directly on it. You can enjoy the same games in a car, on an airplane, or anywhere you go.

Indiegogo Exclusive

Every backer will receive a dock marked with “Funder Edition” on its top. We guarantee that every backer will receive their Ingeo before it is available in retail. 

We also offer Ingeo with a special exterior design and color exclusively to Indiegogo backers. This option is only available during this Indiegogo campaign and will not be available in retail. 

For Game Developers

If your game supports standard controllers it should work with Ingeo right away. We provide an optional SDK. You can take advantage of non-standard features of our controller by using our SDK. 

You submit your games to Google Play as usual. Just let us know that your game supports Ingeo and we will include it in Ingeo Game Center for free. 

Ingeo gives your games access into living rooms and gives customers more opportunities to play them. 

Pledge Options

Where We Are At

Our prototype shown in the video is, of course, not of the final production quality. We used 3D printing to manufacture the main parts of the dock and controller. The final product will be manufactured using molds and the exterior will be coated to enhance tactile perception and aesthetic appearance. In the end it will look even better than the concept art!

Our current dock prototype has circuitry to support standard MHL 5pin and Samsung MHL 11pin connectors and is capable of transferring video to an HDTV.

We are working on the interface for the modular Micro USB port with Slimport support. The final product will support all MHL and Slimport enabled phones.

We are practically done with the industrial design of the dock. Our expandable design will allows adjustment to the dock in order to fit phones with any sizes and orientations perfectly. The final product will require a one-time setup for the specific phone and will have a button to lock the configuration.

Ingeo controller is at a stage of perfecting exterior design. We take this stage very seriously and do not make any compromises. We want Ingeo controller to be the best controller you've put your hands on!


We still need to go through a round of a controller circuit board design. Our company has 3 very experienced electrical engineers with lots of shipped projects under their belt that will be doing this job.

Substantial progress is made in developing Ingeo Game Center app. We are virtually done with art, layouts, and app architecture. The rest of the app development will be led by Aleksey, the Co-Founder of Ingeonix. He is our guru when it comes to software and has 15 years of software development experience.

Production Plan

According to our development plan the first development units will be shipped in January 2014. We are going to start delivery to backers in early March or 4 months after our Indiegogo campaign ends.

We established relationship with hardware manufacturers through our previous products development. We are planning to utilize these connections in Ingeo production as well.

How are we going to use your money

We need your support to push this idea to the market. The money we gather here will be used for: 

  • Finalizing industrial and circuit design. 
  • FCC and other regulatory approvals. 
  • We want to achieve our ambitious price goal by making bulk parts preorders. 
  • Manufacturing process (assembly setup, packaging, shipping). 

Who We Are

Ingeonix is a company founded by Yanning Zhu and Aleksey Fadeev in 2011. 

We specialize in input controllers for computing devices. We have developed a device called VirTouch-R which allows finger tracking and gesture recognition to interact with computing devices. We also developed VirTouch-K an interactive body gesture controlled system based on MS Kinect body sensor. 

Check us out at www.ingeonix.com

Risks and challenges

Our team has recently completed the entire production cycle of VirTouch-R, a finger-tracking device that allows users to control computers with gestures. Given the team's track record and the fact that we have moved quite far into the development of Ingeo, we believe there is no risk in completion of product design. Based on the experience we have learned from manufacturing our previous products, we also think there is no risk in producing the final product in bulk and delivering them to you.

There is chance that the delivery of the product will be delayed. There are factors in the manufacturing process that are sometimes out of our control. For example, the number of iterations in fine tuning the product to pass our quality assurance tests and the availability of parts. If delay occurs, we will clearly communicate the reason and expected delay duration to you. Based on our experience, the overall delay should be no longer than one to two months.

story:
HELLO WORLD

Hi there! My name is Todd Harper. I'm a researcher in media and game studies, particularly interested in diversity and games. You might know me from my seemingly non-stop Twitter feed, or as one of the hosts of Gayme Bar, or from my recent GDC panel on queerness in gaming and writing for Polygon, or my blog, among many other things.

I'm extremely happy to be giving a talk at this year's Gaymer X, specifically a talk about being a fat, queer gamer, a subject that is obviously important to me and about which there isn't enough talk. As I've written about before, the way we talk about fatness in games is already pretty awful, and for many queer people, body type is a source of pain and ostracism that comes from inside the queer community as well as from outside. I think more discussions about how these things collide are really important, much in the same way that Gaymer X itself is partly about helping queer gamers reconcile their nerd identity and their queer identity. 

However, right now my financial situation is really precarious, and just getting to Gaymer X is going to present a challenge. That's where this campaign comes in.


How can we help, asked the internet

Basically, I need money for a plane ticket. I'm extremely lucky in that friends have offered me a place to stay. However, as some of you may know, my current job is coming to an end soon and as of right now, a new one has not emerged. This means the next few months are going to be pretty tight, money-wise, and I'm already managing the debt that getting a PhD incurs (it's a lot).

Having even a portion of the cost of the ticket funded -- which as of June 5 is between $560 and $800, depending on the airline -- would be enormously helpful. Money above the goal will help to pay for a better flight, baggage fees, and other travel expenses during the trip, like meals.


But what do we get out of it?

Other than my undying gratitude? Hopefully one of the included perks will appeal to you (and be within your budget). Beyond that, though, you'll be supporting the talk, and my work in general.


What if I don't have money to donate right now?

Believe me, I understand that there's a ton of worthy causes out there, usually more than people have money to support. But even $5 helps, if you can spare it, and if you can't, please spread the word about this campaign!


In closing

Thank you for giving this campaign a look. I'm really lucky to have this opportunity; it's just happened during a very unlucky time in my life and so I have to ask for some help. Being able to put even a little bit of financial woe behind me while I work on getting big life things back on track would be a huge, invaluable help.
story_txt: HELLO WORLDHi there! My name is Todd Harper. I'm a researcher in media and game studies, particularly interested in diversity and games. You might know me from my seemingly non-stop Twitter feed, or as one of the hosts of Gayme Bar, or from my recent GDC panel on queerness in gaming and writing for Polygon, or my blog, among many other things.I'm extremely happy to be giving a talk at this year's Gaymer X, specifically a talk about being a fat, queer gamer, a subject that is obviously important to me and about which there isn't enough talk. story:
Spoodle (Speed Doodle)

My name is James Durack and I am a Civil Engineer from Brisbane Australia. 

I believe in Innovation. 

For more than 1 yr now Bianca Hollis, David Nimmo and myself have been passionately slaving over a simple idea that evolved into something much larger and much more exciting than we ever anticipated. 

I was brought up in a family that lived for creativity and innovation. Get me on your team for anything that involves drawing or painting and I guarantee you will be an international superstar within a week. 

I am not going to lie, I would rank in at least top 7 in the world if I ever entered a worldwide Pictionary competition. If only I wasn't so bored of all these drawing games/apps involving unlimited time and completely ridiculous word databases - who on this logical planet earth wants to draw Skrillex? I am assuming half of you reading this are asking 'who or what is a Skrillex!'. 

My brother and I decided it was time to take our top 7 in the world Pictionary skills to the next level and add insanely intense time limits to the words we were drawing and create what we called 'Pictionary on Steroids'.

The screen shot above is from the select word screen in Spoodle. You can see that the category is 'Glorious Food' and you can see the time limits on the left with the star rewards on the right.

The game would work like this, 2 people minimum. One person selects a category and a random word from that category. The 2nd person (the guesser) is told what the category is to give them a small amount of help when guessing the 2nd players drawing. 

The category is - 'Sports' and the word you are drawing is 'Golf'. 

Now, heres the catch... you have 3 seconds to draw it. 

Remember that the guesser knows that the category is sports. 

'Pictionary on steroids' instantly became a favourite among our friends and family. My Boss and I even played a game one night at the pub and it wasn't even awkward when I absolutely obliterated him. 

I had to share this game with the world... but what do we call it and how do we share it?

We realise that a Spoodle is a breed of dog, however, it also = Speed + Doodle which perfectly describes the game. It stuck and we love it. 

We didn't stop at seriously intense time limits... What if we could add different handicaps to the way you had to draw? What if you had to draw the word blindfolded, dizzy or without lifting a finger? What if the pen was super thick so it was hard to draw detail? What if you could only draw in dots or if the guesser didn't know the category?

Screen shot above of the Spoolette Wheel in spoodle with the 10 different drawing modes!

What better way to add these drawing handicaps than by using a roulette style wheel with 10 different drawing modes!

Please watch the video to find out more on how Spoodle works. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We have completed majority of the app development, tested and resolved all but some remaining bugs/issues. We can even provide pre-release builds of the app for you to try. 
  • We desperately need you to help us fund the marketing, final development and server side functionality of the app so we can push the game over the line for the world to enjoy. Without adequate release funding, indie game developers lie dead in the water when competing against the much larger developers with much larger budgets such as Rovio (angry birds), King (candy crush) and Zynga (draw something). 
  • By helping us, not only will you help speed doodling become the next biggest craze but you will help some fellow Aussies tackle the app giants to become the next 'fruit ninja' success story.
  • Please refer to the perks below for what we offer to you for helping us!

The screen shot above is from the draw screen in Spoodle - Told you I would be at least top 7!

The Impact of Your Funds

Your funds will go directly to a marketing campaign with a large in-app advertising marketing company. This company will then advertise Spoodle in other apps to drive downloads up and ultimately push Spoodle into the top 100 on the app store. Without your contribution, Spoodle would struggle to reach a top 100 rank and would be invisible to the world, caught within the enormous pool of 100 million apps on the app store. 

Drawing apps have a proven track record - 'Draw Something' developed by OMGPOP is a Pictionary based drawing and guessing game that many of you may have heard of. At its peak, Draw Something had more than 35 million users worldwide! check out their stats - http://www.wired.co.uk/news/archive/2012-03/26/draw-something-success 

Please understand that any help whether it be financial or as simple as telling a friend could potentially make our dream come true. 

Other Ways You Can Help!

If you can't provide funding but love the app and would love to see it happen - please share this link as mach as possible! We would be forever grateful for any kind of help.

Thank you for reading and promise me you will never play Pictionary again with boringly slow time limits! Challenge yourself! Draw a Camel in 5 seconds!

The screen shot above is the Spoodle gallery - see if you can guess what it is??!!

The image above is the retro limited edition poster that is part of the Spoodle God Perk!

story:
Matt's Journey

As some of you may know, Matt has been fundraising money for a friends charity called Little Voice.  Over the past several years Matt has competed in 4 IronMan races and has raised over 10,000$ to support this charity. 

This year he met a lifelong goal to qualify for the World Championships in Kona, Hawaii.  I am very proud of the work he has done and want to help give back to him and get him to Kona to live out his dream!! 

50/50 Draw

Matt would not want people just giving him cash, so I thought I would give chances to win cash instead:

  • For every $10 you donate a ticket with you name will be entered in a draw.
  • We will draw one name after Matt crosses the finish line in Kona!
  • Win up to $1000.

story:
Now’s the time to bring the Party to your phone!

In the past we spent too much time searching for the perfect club, bar or event! Well that’s OUVA now! 

OUVA - the Clubfinder brings you the best, cheapest or nearest locations directly to your phone.

How does it work? 
You want to find a club that plays pop music and has an "all-you-can-drink" event? OUVA will find you the nearest or cheapest one of those!
You want to find a bar within 5 kilometres? No problem, OUVA will find you the perfect bar within 5 kilometres.

The Story Behind OUVA:

We went to the same 5 clubs every week, which was fine at first but quickly got quite boring. We were looking online for popular clubs but we only found the same 5 clubs we already knew. After searching for a while we finally found a club we wanted to go to, but at that point the night was basically over. We felt the urgent need to solve this problem and as we are students of a technical college, we found the best way to do this is by developing an app that brings the clubs directly to us.


We are students of the HTL Ottakring, which is a technical college in Vienna, Austria. We started OUVA out of our own interest and are currently doing it for our diploma thesis. But don’t think just because we’re students we’re not good enough to do OUVA: We built the team with the most competent students and are willing to put a lot of our free time into OUVA.


Technical Issues:

These issues are the ones every App-Developer has to struggle with: App-Development is dynamic subject. For example when swift 2.0 was released we had to change the code to an extend and the same is true for Androids material design release. But we are capable of adapting to these minor issues.

Popularity:

Popularity is probably the biggest problem we have to overcome. The problem with popularity is that clubs won’t sign up to an unpopular app. To solve this problem we’ll put a lot of effort into marketing. But popularity is something we need our users' help as well. This is your chance to be a part of OUVA and help it to succeed. 





Do you like our idea? Then support us by backing this campaign or simply like, share or follow us on Twitter and Facebook. And spread the word about OUVA!

story:
Welcome to SS Refresh 2014

A little about me, I love pinball! As a lover of pinball and being from Minnesota it did not take long to find out about SS billiards. A great classic arcade and pool hall. I loved it!

LLoyd (LTG) is an amazing treasure of the pinball world. Through smoking bans and changing trends he has kept SS alive for over 40 years.

So what's this about...... A dream, a wish to honor a legend. Refreshing SS billiards for the future. 

Update: WOW!!!!! Can you believe we did this!

We made our goal plus more. It took some time to get the money from the fundraiser but WE HAVE IT NOW. Working on getting all perks sent out. Working on getting flooring details finalized.

Working on the custom cue balls if you won this perk please email me at sosssbill@gmail.com for setting this perk up.

Keep up with progress at 

https://pinside.com/pinball/forum/topic/honoring-ltg-w-the-ss-billiards-2014-refresh/page/16#post-1793670
